Kw’iherezo ry’urugendo, Kuk-ur-umwizigirwa, Uzoduganwa mu bwiza Ku Murwa w’amahoro.

Mu gitondo vyose birangiye, Nzoguruka; Nigire mu Gihugu ca Yesu, Nzoguruka.
Chœur : Nzoguruka mu bwiza , nzoguruka Kw’iherezo, Haleluya ubu nyene, nzoguruka.
Hasigay-igihe gito cane Nkaguruka; Mu Gihugu c’umunezero mwinshi, Nzoguruka.
Ata gitutu c’ubugingo bwanje, Nzoguruka; Nk’inyon-ibohotse mw’ibohero, Nzoguruka.

Mfis-Umukiza ni Mwiza cane, Yaramberey-Ikimazi; Yatanz-Ubugingo bwiWe Bwera, Maz-Arampfira ku giti.
Chœur : Yarambambiwe ku giti, Yarambambiwe ku giti; Yarankuye kw’icaha, Arambohora; Yarambambiwe ku giti.
Yasiz-Ubwiza bwiWe mw’Ijuru Kugira ngw’Aducungure; Hano kw’isi Yaciye bugufi, Atubohoz-Amaraso.
Yarababajwe, ni je Yahowe, Yajanjaguwe ku bwanje; Yishize kw’indwara zanje zose, Arapfa maz-Arankiza.
Yakijij-abo mu bura bwa Se, Arahez-Aja mw’Ijuru; Azogaruka, mbeg-iryo banga! Mbeh-ibihe bidashira.

Bazov-i buseruko, Bazov-i burengero Mu bihugu vyose, abatumiwe Gusangira n’Umwami; Babon-ubwiza bwiWe, Bazosayangana, Ni bo ntete z’ubuyeye Z’igitsibo ciWe.
Chœur : Ndaremye mu mutima, Yes-Ah-Ambohoreye; Sinkiremerewe n’imitwaro, Mfis-ingat-ihwahutse, Nari mu mwijima, Ubu warahunze; Nsemerera mfis-intsinzi Ko Yesu Yambohoye.
Hazob-aber-imbere Y’intebe nini yera, Ata marira, ata mubabaro, Hatagira n’urupfu; Umwam-ubu ni y-Ari Gutegur-inzira; Vuba tuzoba hamw- Ibihe bidashira.
Amarembo y’Aho Hera, Aguma yuguruye Umurango hamwe n’ijoro; Muze murab-Umwami, N-umunyabuntu rwose. Har-ibibanza vyiza; Itab-ubutumire Bwo gutah-ubukwe.
Ehe Yes-Araje vuba Gukurah-imibabaro. Mbeg-Umwami hamwe yozir-ubu Abadafis-ivyaha, Wogir-amahoro Canke amaganya? Azoz-Ari mu bwiza, TuMusanganire.
N-isezerano ry’imvur-ihereza; Rangamiza rab-ingano zeze: Ibitangaza kw’izina rya Yesu. Munywe Bantu banj-imvur-ihereza.

Eh-Ubutumwa buryoshe Ndabwamamaza: Yes-uko Yar-Ar-ejo N’ubu ni kw-Ameze. Arakiz-abanyavyaha Hamwe n’indwara; Araremesh-Agacecekesh-umuyaga.
Chœur : Yes-uko Yar-Ar-ejo N’ubu ni kw-Ameze; Vyose birahinduk-ariko NtAhinduka! Dushim-Izina ryiWe, Dushim-Izina ryiWe; Vyose birahinduka, We ntAhinduka!
Arakund-abanyavyah- Arakurondera; Ca bugufi munyavyaha, Ngw-ino wihane. Aho kuguhan-Arakwihanikiriza Araharira ivyaha We ntAhinduka.
Aho Yari hano kw’isi Yahor-Akiza. N’ub-Arasend-amarushw- Akayadukiza. Yarakijij-umugore YaMukozeko; Na we ni wizera ntuzobura gukira.
Nka Petero, naw- Aragukuramw-ubwoba; Agukaramwo gukekeranya nka Toma. Ya ntumw-ikundwa Yahor-iMwihengekako. Azokwakir-Agushire mu gikiriza.
Yaragendeye ku mazi Mu gihuhuta. Acecekesh-umuyaga Nk’i Galilaya. I Getsemane Yasengany- Umubabaro. Asangira natw-igikombe c’amaganya.
Nk’uko Yagendanye N’abaj-i Emawusi, Agendana natwe Mu nzira y’ubugingo. Wa mus-uregerej- Aho tuzoMubona; Azob-Ari Yesu nk’uko Yaduz-Ameze.

Umus-uregereje, Ah-ata kubabara. Nta bicu bizobayo, Nta n’amarira namba. Azob-ar-amahoro Mu gihugu c’inzahabu. Ukunt-uwo mus-ari mwiza!
Chœur : Mbeg-umusi mwiza! Aho nzobona Yesu Imbonankubone; Uwankijije ku bw’ubuntu. Azomfat-ukuboko, Anjane mur-ico Gihugu. Ukunt-uwo mus-ari mwiza!
Nta gahinda kabayo, Nta mutwar-ugerayo, Nta n’ingwar-izobayo Canke gutandukana. Nzoguma nibanira N’Uwankuz-Akanyitangira. Ukunt-uwo mus-ari mwiza!

Umv-igituma nezerewe : Yesu Yarampariy-ivyaha vyose. Ndirimba nshim-Umwami Yesu ; Kuko Yankunze bihebuje. Umutima wanje war-unaniwe ; Ndemeshwa na Yesu ndonk-amahoro. Non-ubu nsigaye ndirimba Urukundo rw’Umwami Yesu.

cantique.titre: MU GIHUGU UMWAGAZI ARI WE MUCO

livre.cantique:
Hirya y’inyenyeri har-Igihugu, N-Igisagara kitarimw-ijoro; Abizigirwa tuzocinjiramwo, N-Igisagar-Umwagaz-Ari We Muco.
Chœur : Mu Gisagar-Umwagaz-Ari We muco, Gisagara kitarimw-ijoro, Mfisey-ingoro nzinza, ni nava mu marushwa, Nzogend-iy-Umwagaz-Ari We Muco.
Izuba ritwakira kino gihe, Tubona yuko ritumurikira, Rizohinduk-ibicu ni twagenda Mu Gisagar-Umwagaz-Ari We Muco.
Hariy-amashurw-adakabirana, N’umurango w’ibihe bidashira; Burundu nzohanagurw-amarira, Mu Gisagar-Umwagaz-Ari We Muco.
Hano kw’isi har-ukuburanirwa, Tukizigira, tugahemukirwa; Tuzogir-amahor-ata marira Mu Gisagar-Umwagaz-Ari We Muco.
Ni haz-ibicu, ni haze n’ijoro, Nta gitutu je mfise mu mutima, Nzi ko mw’Ijuru mfisey-Ikibanza, Mu Gisagar-Umwagaz-Ari We Muco.

Nyen-umurima Arabaz-Ati, «Ni nde notuma mu musaruro, Ni nde yogarur-abazimiye, Bagatorany-inzir-ipfunganye?».
Chœur : Vuga, Mwami! Vuga, Mwami! Vuga, nzoca nishura ntatevye; Vuga, Mwami! Vuga, Mwami! Vuga, nishure nti, «Ntuma, Mwami».
Ah-ikara ryaka rikoreye Ku munwa, rikez-umuvugishwa; Ijwi Riti, «Ni nde yoTugira?» Ni ho yishur-ati, «Ntuma, Mwami».
Ibihumbi bapfira mu vyaha; Umv-amarira y’ababoroga, Nyaruka mugenzi gutabara, Wishur-uvug-uti, «Ntuma, Mwami».
Vub-umusarur-uzob-uheze, Tuzokoranirizwa mw’Ijuru, Umwami wac-Azotubwir-Ati, «Mwana, warakoze neza cane!».

Imana Yankunze ndi mu vyaha, Nari ngow-Inzanir-amahirwe, Nari nzimiy-Iranzimurura: N-urukundo ruhebuje.
Chœur : Urukundo ruhebuje! Urukundo ruhebuje! Yankunze kera nkiri mu vyaha: N-Urukundo ruhebuje.
Kristo Yaraj-Amber-Ikimazi, Yemeye kumpfir-i Gologota; Ndabuz-uko novug-amazina Y’Urukundo rwankijije.
Nabayeho ntsinzwe n’urubanza, Maze Dat-Antumir-Umukiza, Mpabw-Umucunguzi nar-umuja Yirengagiz-agakiza.
Ubu naragarutse kwa Data, Ambwira yuko ntakir-umuja; Si nd-icangaz-ubu mur-iyi si, Antez-amaboko y’ubuntu.

Imana Nzima ni Yes-Umwami w’amahoro, Data wa twese n’Umwami w’ubwiza, N-Umunyabwenge, ni We Yanaremye vyose; Muri Yesu har-ukunengesera kwose.
Chœur : Vyose ni We, Vyose ni We, Ukunengesera kwose muri We; Vyose ni We, Vyose ni We, Yesu ni We Mana Mushoboravyose.
Imana Imanuweli, Yehov-Ahoraho, Ni We Mpwemu Yamaho, Akuzura hose, Muherezi Mukuru, Akab-Umwagazi, Ni We Mucunguzi: Dushim-Izina ryiWe.
Tanguriro, Herezo, Alufa, Omega Ni Jambo mu mubiri Mukunzi w’Abera, Nyenugutungana, Nyenukugororoka Ivyo nkeneye vyose, mbisanga muri We.
Iyo Mana twaronder-Izoshimwa rwose N-Abana b’Isirayeli, Yes-Agarutse; N-Umwagaz-Azob-Aje, kubohor-abiWe; Rya joro Yaratsinz-Aranengesereye.
Mbega bavuga ko mva he? Bavuga ko ndi nde? MuraMuzi Data? Muz-Izina ryiWe? Yesu ni We Kunengesera kw’Imana, Yesu ni We Ndiho, Ni W-Ar-Umwami w’abami.
Dushim-Umukiza Kw-Ashobora vyose; Yagiy-i Golgota, Akiz-ababisha. Ni We Mucunguzi, Yatsinze Satani: Dushim-Umukiza cane pe.
[Umus-umwe NzoMubona Yesu;] 2x Ninabandany-inzira, Nkaguma ndaMwizeye; Umus-umwe NzoMubona Yesu.

Mpfukamye ku musaraba Ku birenge vy’Umwami, Ndaje kuri We nifuza Kub-umwigishwa wiWe. Nd-intama y’ubusho bwiWe, Ndi mu kuboko kwiWe, Ndi ku musozi mu bwatsi: Mfis-amahirwe menshi.
Chœur : Mpfukamye ku musaraba Ku birenge vy’Umwami, Ndaje kuri We nifuza Kub-umwigishwa wiWe.
Kuva ndaMutoranije, Nuzuy-umunezero; Narasezey-agahinda, Ndi mu ntsinzi ya Yesu. Narasezey-ivyifuzo Vy’isi vyangerageza Nahaw-amahoro ku Bw-Amaraso y’i Golgota.
Vuba ndangij-igikorwa, Nzoshika ku kivuko C’Igihugu ciza cane C’Uwaneshej-urupfu. NzoGuseserez-impundu Z’urukundo Wankunze; Warantangiy-impongano Y’ibihe bidashira.

N-iki conk-ivyaha? N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu. N-iki conyeza rwose? N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu.
Chœur : Amaraso yaWe Ni y-Anyeza rwose, Nta compa gukira Nk’Amaraso yaWe Yesu.
Icompa guharirwa, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu; Nta kindi ciru mfise, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu.
Icompezakw-ivyaha, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu; Nta ciza co nakoze, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu.
Ni WeWe nizigira, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu; Bugororotsi bwanje, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu.
Nta kindi notsindisha, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu; Nzoshikanwa mw’Ijuru, N-Amaraso yaWe Yesu.
Ngutazirire cane Amaraso yaWe Yesu; Nzany-amashimwe menshi Y’Amaraso yaWe Yesu.

Tuzigujwe n’urukundo rwaWe, Ubwiza bwaWe ni nk-ubw’izuba; Tuzigujwe n’urukundo rwaWe, Ni co gituma tuKwizigiye.
Chœur : Shimwa Yesu Munezero wacu Shimwa Yesu Waradukijije Shimwa Yesu Waradukunze pe Ni co gituma tukwizigiye.
Ntaco Wanyegej-Umugeni waWe Amabanga yose yahishuwe Ishashara ry’indwi ryahishuwe Twitez-ukugaruka kw’Umwami.
Irakwitaho Irakwitaho Ku murango no mw’ijoro Irakwitayeho.

Numva Yes-Ampamagara x3 Ati ng-uNkurikire.
Chœur : NzoMukurikira hose x3 Tuzojana na Yesu.
Tuzojana no mu rupfu x3 Tuzojana mu nzira.
Tuzojana mu rukinja x3 Tuzojana mu nzira.
Azomp-ubuntu n’ubwiza x3 Tuzogendana na We.

Mubivuge kw’isi yose: Kw-Idukunda. Yesu yavuye mw’ijuru: Kw-Idukunda. Yadupfiriy-i Golgota; Kw-i Pasika Yarazutse. Twarakijijw-Aleluya: Kw-Idukunda; Kw-Idukunda, kw-Idukunda. Mubivuge kw’isi yose yukw-Idukunda.
Ni turirimbire hamwe: Kw-Idukunda. Muri Yo turahiriwe: Kw-Idukunda. Wew-udobeye mu vyaha, Nuze ku Mukiza Wawe. Yes-Azoguh-amahoro: Kw-Igukunda. Kw-Ibakunda, Kw-Idukunda. Ni turirimbire hamwe: kw-Idukunda.

Umus-umwe nzoMubona Yesu, Tuzibanira na We. Bikwiye ko tuMuninahaza; Yararangije vyose.
Chœur : Ubwiza mbikiweyo (x2) Kubona Yesu, kubana na We Ubwiza bwinshi, Ku bacunguwe bose.
Yarishizekw-igihano canje Aremera kumpfira Ku bw’ubuntu nzohabw-igitsibo Nuzuy-umunezero.
Nzosangayo abo nkunda bose Turirimbane hamwe Rek-uwo munezero wa bukwi Ushwashwanur-imitima.
Haririmbw-Amaraso ya Yesu Ku kiyaga c’ibiyo Isi n’ijuru biririmbane Hamwe n’abatoranijwe.
Mfash-inanga yanje Mpimbaz-Imana Ku bw’intsinzi yaYo Ibihe vyose Nta gahinda mfise Ndi mu munezero Mfis-inzu nziza Hiyo mw’ijuru Hafi ya Yesu.

Ku musaraba w’umukiza Aho ni ho natakambiye Ni h-Amaraso yanshikako Yes-Ahimbazwe.
Chœur : Yes-Ahimbazwe, Yes-Ahimbazwe Ni h-Amaraso yanshikako Yes-Ahimbazwe.
Agakiza k’igitangaza Katumye Yes-Angereramwo Aho ni ho Yanyakiriye Yes-Ahimbazwe.
Ya soko nziz-ikur-ivyaha Mpibawe n’uko nayozemwo Ni yo Yes-Ahor-Ankirisha Yes-Ahimbazwe.
Ngw-ino kw’isoko nini nziza Pfukam-imbere y’Umukiza Ni wisuke muri Yo wezwe Yes-Ahimbazwe.

Murikir-imitim-iri mu mwiza Numurike, numurike Numurikir-abakiri mu vyaha Numurike, numurike.
Chœur : Urumuri rw’abizera bose, Kiriza, rukirize, Rumurikir-abari mu buja, Urumuri rwo kwa Yesu.
Imiliyoni ziritez- Ijambo Numurike, numurike Nubah-ivyiza vy-Ubwami bw-Ijuru Numurike, numurike.
Itanga gutwar-umuco w’Imana Numurike, numurike Nuze musi y-ibendera ry’umuco Numurike, numurike.

Ni naca mu gitutu Nzobon-Umwami Yesu Ni W-Anyitaba mu ngorane zose Ni naca mu gitutu Nzoheza ndaMubone UzoMumenyera ku nkovu ziWe.
Chœur : NzoMumenya, NzoMumenya Ku bw’inkovu mu rubavu rwiWe NzoMumenya, nzoMumenya Ku bw’inkovu z’ibiganza vyiWe.
Ninahez-igikorwa Nzoca njabuk-uruzi Nzobon-igitondo gikayangana Ninagera hakurya Nzobonay-Umukiza Azonyakiran-akanyamuneza.
Nzonezerwa mbony- Ubwiza bwo mu nyonga hiWe NzoMushimira mfis-umunezero Imbabazi n’ubuntu n’urukundo vyatumye Ampaho mba mu rugo rwo mw’ijuru.
Abariyo nkunda Bariko baranyakura Bamwe twasezeranira ku ruzi Arik-uwo nipfuza ko Nobon-ubwa mbere N-Umucunguzi wanje Yanyiguze.
Azoncisha mu kirimb- Anshikane mu rugo Anyambits-impuzu zera derere Nzoririmbana n’Abera N’Abamarayika Ndifuza cane kubon-Umukiza.

Numv-Umukiz-Ambwira Ko mbuz-inkomezi, Ngo name ndaMusenga, Ntaco nzoMuburana.
Chœur : Yanyishuriye, Ya myenda yose; Yarampariy-ivyaha, Vyahinduts-umweru.
Ni W-Afis-inkomezi Zibasha gukiza, Zikiz-ab’imibembe, Zigakiz-umutima.
Singir-iciza nkora, Nibesherejweho N-ubuntu bwaWe gusa, Nezwa de n’Amaraso.
Nasa n’uwahwereye Mu mutima wanje, Yesu Yarawuzuye, Arawukomeza pe.
Imbere ya ya ntebe Nzohagararayo, Nzojanay-minyago Ndayihereze Yesu.
Kumera nka Yesu ( X2) Mur-uru rugendo rwo turimwo, Nifuza kuba nka We Kugeza nshitse mu bwiza mw’Ijuru.

Hafi y’Umusaraba, Har-isoko nziza; Ni ho har-agakiza Kav-i Kaluvari.
Chœur : Ku Giti ca Yesu Mfiseh-amahirwe; Nzamurwe mu mutima, Name mu mahoro.
Hafi y’Umusaraba, Ndonseh-imbabazi; Nakiwe n’Inyenyeri Y’agaturuturu.
Hafi y’Umusaraba, Nyerek-ivyabaye, Umpe kwama ngendera Mu gitutu caWo.
Mwami Yes-Unyemeze Uwo Musaraba Kugira ngo ngendere Mu rukundo rwaWe.
Ni W-utum-umutima Wank-ivy’isi vyose, Nkaba nkund-Umukiza Kuko Yampfiriye.
Hafi y’Umusaraba Nguma ndaMwizeye, Ndorereye ca gihe, Nzojabuk-uruzi.

Gitandara camaho, Reka nguhungireko; Amazi n’Amaraso, Vyo mu rubavu rwaWe, Binkiz-uburyo bwompi, Binyez-ivyaha vyanje.
Amosoz-adashira N’umwete wanje wose Ntivyonkurakw-ivyaha; Ni WeWe gus-Unkiza; Nta co mfise nozana, Nizey-Umusaraba.
N-uko nkiriho mw’isi, Igihe nzorangiza, Aho nzoba ndengutse, Nshitse mu nyonga zaWe, Gitandara camaho, Uz-Undeke Nkwisunge.

Gitandara c’Imana, Reka nguhungireko, Ku bw’imbabazi zaWe Kera waramenewe; Non-ubu nkwihishemwo Ukuraka kw’Imana.
Amazi n’Amaraso Vyo mu rubavu rwaWe Binkiz-uburyo bwompi Urubanza rw’ivyaha N’ubushobozi bwavyo, Vyoye kuntsind-ukundi.
Ivyo twokora vyose, N’umwete wacu wose, N’umubabaro mwinshi, N’amosoz-adashira, Vyose ntivyoshobora Kudukurakw-ivyaha.
Raba ndagenda gusa, Ndakwinginz-unyambike; Sinshobora kwikiza, Ndakugomba k’ubuntu; Unyuhagir-imvyiro Mukiza, noye gupfa.
Ivyanje ntibigira Ico bimaze Yesu, Simfis-ico noguha, Ndaba ku musaraba Wawe Wampfiriyeko, Ni wo nizeye gusa.
N-uko nkiriho mw’isi, Mwami nguhungireko; No ku musi w’imanza, Nshitse mu nyonga zaWe, Gitandara c’Imana Uz-Undeke nkwisunge.

Ni Wewe nizeye, Umwana w’intama, Umukiza; NdaGusavye WeWe, Unkurekw-ivyaha, Maz-Uc-Unyakira Ncik-uwaWe.
Ur-Umunyabuntu, Nkomez-umutima, Mvugutira. Ni We Wampfiriye, NUmpe kuGukunda, Umucanwa wake muri jewe.
Mu ngorane zose N’ibigeragezo, Unyobore. Kurah-umwijima, Nkurakw-amarira, Simbe kure yaWe, Yesu Wanje.
Mbeg-Inkuru! Yuko Yes-Ahora-Akiza! Mbeg-Inkuru! Yes-Araharira! Mbeg-Inkuru! N-Umunyarukundo rwinshi! Mbeg-Inkuru! Yampay-ivyo vyose.

Nujan-Izina rya Yesu, Mu ngoran-ubabaye Rirakuremesha cane; Rijan-ah-uja hose.
Chœur : N-Izina Ryiza pe, BaRyizigire mw’isi; N-Izina ryiza cane, BaRishime mw’Ijuru.
Ni hagir-umunt-ashimwa W’umunyacubahiro; Naho yokirush-abandi, Yesu We n-Agaheta.
Guman-Izina rya Yesu, Ni Ryo nkinz-ikomeye; Haj-ibikugerageza, Tabaza Yesu vuba.
Izina Ry’Umwami Yesu Rinter-umunezero; Kukw-Ankikij-urukundo, Nzama ndaMutazira.
Ni Ryo Ryampay-Ububasha Bwo kunesh-ivy’iyi si, Ryangobotoye mu buja; Ndons-umwidegemvyo pe.
Twunamir-Izina ryiWe, NituRipfukamire, Twimik-Umwami w’abami, Turangij-urugendo.
Amavi yos-apfukame Kw’Izina ry’Umukiza; N’indimi zize zemere Ko Yes-Ar-Uhoraho.
N-amahirwe kub-uwa Yesu (X3) NAshimwe Haleluya NAshimwe, Haleluya (X6) Haleluya nAshimwe.
Ntihagir-ic-utinya, Rema, nureme, B-amahoro, Nuraramur-umutwe, Urabe Yesu, Nta c-Akenye; Umwans-ukw-ari kwose, Rema, nureme, Yaratsinzwe, [Kw’Izina Rikomeye, Ry’Umwami Yesu, Uratsinze.] X2.
Ntutiny-izere gusa, X2 Vyose birashoboker-umuntu yizera, Rab-Umukiza Wawe, Nta ho Yiger-Aneshwa; Vyose birashoboker-umuntu yizera.

Muganga Mwiz-Ari hano, Mukunzi wacu Yesu, Ni W-Avyur-abahenutse, Niwumv-Ijwi Rya Yesu!
Chœur : Riririmbwa n’abaserafi, Riraryoshe ku bo kw’isi, N-Izina Ryo guhimbaza, Yesu, shimwa Yesu.
Warababariw-ivyaha, Niwumv-Ijwi Rya Yesu; Gend-amahoro mw’Ijuru Kwironker-igitsibo.
Ishimwe n-iry’Umwagazi, Ubu nizera Yesu, Nkund-Izina ry’Umukiza, Nkund-Izina Rya Yesu!
Izina rikur-ubwoba, S-Irind-atari Yesu; Ukunt-umutim-ushima Kwumv-Izina Rya Yesu.

Igisagara c’Umuco Cubatsw-iyo mw’Ijuru, Nta munt-ari ngaha Kw’is-ariger-acinjiramwo.
Chœur : Har-Umwagazi w’Intama, We Rukundo rw’Imana, Amurikir-igisagara, Yerusalemu nsha.
Hariyo ubwiza bwinshi N’Igiti c’Ubugingo, Hatemberay-imigende Y’Uruzi rw’Ubugingo.
Ingenzi nizahashika, Zirushe ku bw’inzira, Ku masoko y’Ubugingo Zizoruhukiraho.
Mbeg-umunezero kw’isi, Yes-Azob-Arih-Ari; N-Igisagara c’imico C’ibihe bidashira.

Mbeg-uri mu bagiz-Umugeni W’Umwami Yesu? Mbega wa mus-uzonezerwa Cank-uzobabara? Mbeg-impuzu zawe zizoba Zimesuwe neza? N-igihe co kwitegurir-ubukwe.
Chœur : Inziman-irateguwe, Maranata, Haleluya, Maranata, Haleluya, Vuba-Umwami Yes-Agir-Agaruke.
Kuber-ivy-usabwe guheb-isi N’ivyayo vyose. Mbeg-ugendera mu muco? Mb-uzoMusanganira? Nimb-utarabohoka Yes-Araguhamagaye; N-igihe co kwitegurir-ubukwe.
Ibiba kw’isi bitwereka, Ko Yes-Agir-Aze; Vyose ni vyashik-ibohorwa Rizova mw’Ijuru. Mu mwijima hazoz-Inyenyeri Yo mu gitondo; N-igihe co kwitegurir-ubukwe.
Mutima wanje rindir-uwo Musi w’amahirwe; Ivya kera bizosimburwa N’ivyaremwe bisha. Ni ho nzohura n’Umwami Yesu N’Abera bose; N-igihe co kwitegurir-ubukwe.

Uhoraho nama ntangazwa rwose N’ivyaremwe n’Ibiganza vyaWe, Inyenyeri n’uguhinda kw’inkuba Vyerekana ububasha bwaWe.
Chœur : Mwami Mana ndaKuririmbira: Uri Nkuru! Uri Nkuru! Mwami Mana ndaKuririmbira: Uri Nkuru! Uri Nkuru!

Ntitwogumaho tunumye, Har-imitim-igowe. Mbega tworer-amaboko, Nka ba sindabibazwa?

Tujane hos-ukwizera, Dukoran-urukundo. Tubiban-ukwizigira; Twiteg-umusaruro.
Is-irabuz-ukwizera, Tuyibwir-ivya Yesu. Ukutitaho ni kwinshi, Muze duhaguruke!
Ni twikuremw-ubunebwe, Hazotsind-urukundo. Naho twogir-intege nke, Ukuri kuzotsinda.

Je nd-ingezi ngaha kw’isi, Ndiko ndaja mw’Ijuru, Mu Gihugu cak-umuco Ubudashira! Kw’isi har-abansi benshi Bama banzigiriza; Nah-inzir-icur-umwiza, Mfis-Uwunkunda, Mfis-Uwunkunda.
Nkundwa na Data w’ubwiza Anyobora mu nzira. Ayoboz-ibango ryanj- Ukuboko kwiWe. Mu bingerageza vyose, Mu makuba mbabaye, Ac-Ambwir-Ati: «Nureme, Ni je Mukiza, Ni je Mukiza!».
Gukorer-Umwami nk’UYO, Nkaguma nihangana, Nkiga kuMumenya neza, Mwitegereza. Nta mahirw-ameze nk’ayo, Nzi yuko nzoheza neza! Umukiza Nyagusengw- Anyobora neza, Anyobora neza.
Azonshikana ku nkombe, Amosoz-azoshira. Nzonezerezwa n’ubwiza Bw’Umwami Yesu. Mbabaye, nta co bitwaye, Ehe Yes’Agir-Aze! Ibohoka rirashitse, Mbonye mw’Ijuru, Mbonye mw’Ijuru!

Mbeg-uz-Igisagara Ciza co mw’Ijuru? Kirakayangana pe! Nta mwijim-uriyo. Ngezi mwe ngaha kw’isi, Mwamana amarira. Ubutunzi bwacu N-Igisagara co mw’Ijuru.
Mbeg-uz-IGisagara, Co gihezagiwe, Camamw-umunezero; Nta gatosi namba? Izuba n-Umwagazi, Arasayangana pe! Agasukamw-Ubugingo Mu Gisagara ciWe.
Cubatswe n’inzahabu, IGihugu cacu! Hariy-Uruzi na ca Giti C’Ubugingo! Nta mutwar-ugerayo, Har-amahoro masa! IGisagara c’Imana, IGihugu cacu.
Salemu w’amahoro, Ni wewe nipfuza! Mwami Mugabo Wacu, TuraKunyotewe! Nze nam-imbere yaWe, Mukama, Mwami Wanje, NGutazire ndaKubwire Yuko nGukeneye.

Izina ry’Umwami Yesu Rimar-Iman-uburake! Ni Ryo Riduhamagara; N-Izina ry’igiciro!

Nkund-Izina ry’Umukiza, Araz-umutima wanje; Ni W-Ampa gutsind-umwansi, N-Izina ry’igiciro!
Iyo ntsitaye mu nzira, Iyo nguye mu binyosha, Mvyurwa n’Iryo Zina ryaWe; Izina ry’igiciro!
Igihe tuzibanira, Igihe nzoKubonera, Ni ho nzokwama mvuga nti: N-Izina ry’igiciro!
Uwanj-Uwanj-Uwanje, Yesu n-Uwanje; Uwanj-Uwanj-Uwanje, Yesu n-Uwanje. Yes-Umukiza Wanje ibihe vyose! Uwanj-Uwanj-Uwanje, Yesu n-Uwanje.
Wangu, Wangu, Wangu, Yesu ni Wangu; Wangu, Wangu, Wangu, Yesu ni Wangu. Yesu, Mwokozi Wangu siku zote! Wangu, Wangu, Wangu, Yesu ni Wangu.

Je nd-umukunzi wa Yesu, Nah-ataco maze; N-Umukunzi Ahambaye, Anjana mw’Ijuru.
Chœur : Yesu n-Umukunzi Dufatanije; Isangira rihezagiwe! Yesu ni We Mukunzi.
N-Umukunz-Arut-abandi, Ntahemuka namba; N-Umukunzi w’amahoro, Adatiny-umwansi.
N-Umukunzi no mu ngwara, Rupfu yegereje; Umukunz-iyo ndengutse, Ndemeshanyo yanje.
Ur-Umukunzi ku mpfiro, Birangiye kw’isi; Mukunz-Unteze mw’Ijuru, Aho nzokwibera.

Izina ryasirana mw’Ijuru, Riririmba muri je. Ijwi ry’Imana ryama rivuga Izina ry’Umukiza.
Chœur : Mfis-indirimbo mu mutima, Ni nziza cane, irahimbaye. Mfis-indirimbo mu mutima, Nshimagiz-Umukiza. Yesu, Yesu, Yesu, Ni Mwiza cane. Izina rya Yesu, Je ndaRipfukamiye.
Ndaririmb-Izina ry’Umukiza, Umucunguzi wanje. NdaMuhimbaza n’ijwi rirenga, Ibihe bidashira.
Riririmbwa n’abatoranijwe Bo n’abamarayika. Bazovumer-Izina rya Yesu, Ibihe bidashira.

Ntutinye mugenzi! Ndi kumwe nawe! Iryo sezerano Rirandemesha. Ku vya ca kiyaya, Simfis-ubwoba; Numva ndemye neza, Ngendana n’Umukiza.
Chœur : Si ndi jenyene, x2 Nzigamwe n’Umwami Yesu, Ntansiga ndi jenyene! Si ndi jenyene, x2 Nzigamwe n’Umwami Yesu, Si ndi jenyene namba!
Igitondo ciza Gitiny-ibicu; Yes-Umuco wanje, Yam-Anyakira. Iyo za nyenyeri Ntakizibona, Yesu mu kirere Anyerek-Amajuru.
Iyo ndi mw’irinde Nkazigirizwa; Yes-Umwami Wanje Ab-Andi hafi. Mu rugendo Yam-Ambwir-Ati, «Ndi hano! Ntutinye, nureme! Nama ndi kumwe nawe!».

Ur-Umugabane Wanje, Ur-Umukunzi Wanje; Mur-uru rugendo rwanje, Reka ngendane naWe.

Woronka h-amahoro? Mw’isi har-ubuhombe. Mu mutima hariho Aho woshira Yesu? Ahagaze ku rugi, Arikw-Aramutsa. Ku bw’Umukiza Yesu, Mb-urafis-ikibanza? Urafis-ikibanza? Urafis-ikibanza? Ku bw’Umukiza Yesu, Mb-urafis-ikibanza?
Yarakubabarijwe N-ubuntu butangaje! Yarwany-Ari ku mavi, Imana Yihishije. Mbeg-urumv-Ijwi ryiWe, Riva mu musaraba Riti: «Munyavyaha we Mb-urafis-ikibanza?» Urafis-ikibanza? Urafis-ikibanza? C’Umunyamibabaro, Mb-urafis-ikibanza?
Nimb-uboshwe n’ivyaha? Mbeg-uzogeza ryari? Nta mahor-uzoronka, Iyi si n-ubuhombe. Ubu bigishoboka, Yobok-Ijambo Ryera Ry’Ijwi ry’Uwanesheje, Muherez-ikibanza! Mb-urafis-ikibanza? Urafis-ikibanza? Ca Yes-Uwanesheje, Mb-urafis-ikibanza?

Mur-iyi si y’ivyaha twe tubayemwo, Dusa n’abaremeshanya,

Ndemeza yuko nacunguwe N’Amaraso y’Umwagazi, Nacunguwe n’Ubuntu bwiWe; Nahinduts-umwana wiWe.

NzoMwiboner-Ari mu Bwiza, Nezerezwa n’ivy-Angera. Anyoboz-urukundo rwiWe; Yamizakw-Amp-indirimbo.

Habayeh-umusozi Warik-umusaraba, W’umubabar-utey-isoni. Ariko ndawukunda, Kuko Yesu Yemeye Kuwukirish-abanyavyaha.

Kand-uwo musaraba, Nah-usuzuguritse, N-uw’igiciro kuri je. Umwagazi w’Imana Yahevy-Ubwiza bwiWe, Awushikan-i Gologota.
Kur-uwo musaraba, Huzuyekw-Amaraso, N-igitangaza gihambaye. Yesu Yarampfiriye Kur-uwo musaraba, Aramparir-ivyaha vyose.
Kand-uwo musaraba, Sinzowuhemukira, Nezerezwa n’isoni zawo. Ndindiriy-umus-umwe, Guhamagarwa na We Nze nibere mu Bwiza bwiWe.

Narabony-Isoko yeza, Inkurakw-ivyaha vyose. Narumviy-Ijwi rya Mpwemu Ambwir-At- “Ingo wezwe.”
Chœur : NzoMushima! NzoMushima! Nshim-Umwagazi Wakerewe! NimuMuhimbaze mwese, Kukw-Amaraso yiWe yeza.
Mur-iyi nzir-ipfunganye, Vyose narabihevye; Imigambi yanje yose Yahinduw-umunyota.
Igicaniro c’Imana Catse mu mutima wanje. Sinzoreka kuMushima, Mpimbaz-Izina ryiWe!
Mpimbaz-Izina rya Yesu! Ryanshikanye muri We. Yarambabariy-ivyaha, Aranyez-umutima.
Hashimwe Data wa twese, Hashimw-Umwana w’Imana, Hashimwe na Mpwemu Yera: Vyose mu Mwami Yesu.

Nilipoona Chemchemi, Kwa dhambi zangu zote; Nikasikia Sauti Kusema, “Uwe safi.”
Chœur : NitaMsifu, NitaMsifu, Msifuni Mwana-Kondoo (Mwana-Kondoo); Mpeni sifa za moyo, Kwani hutupa utakaso.
Njia Yake ni nyembamba, Vyote naMtolea; Fahari na tumaini, Hayo nimeondoa.
Moyo wangu ulichomwa Kwa Moto Wake Mungu; Sitakosa kuMsifu Bwana wa Utukufu.
Jina la Yesu ni heri, Aliyenikubali; Amenisamehe dhambi, Moyo Ameniosha.
Utukufu KwaKe Baba, Utukufu KwaKe Mwana, Utukufu KwaKe Roho, Ndani ya Bwana Yesu.

Umwami Yadukunze Ivy’imbonekarimwe, Atuyobor-imisi yose Nk’inyenyeri yiWe, Aduha Umutsima, Aduha Urukundo; N-Umutsima w’Urukundo Rw’Imana.
Chœur : Ni mury-Umubiri wanJe, Ni munyw-Amaraso yanJe Je Nd-Ubugingo, Nkab-Urukundo, Mwami tujane mu Rukundo rwaWe.
Umwami Yadukunze Ivy’imbonekarimwe. Bamwe bafata yuko yar- Umwana w’umubaji, Yar-Afis-umwuga Nk’ukw-abandi bawugira, Yarakor-Agatam- Imisi yose.
Umwami Yadukunze Ivy’imbonekarimwe: Urukundo rwiWe rwatumy- Apf-urw’umusaraba, Urukundo rwiWe ni rwo Rwaneshej-urupfu, Yavuye mu mv- Aneshejeje kuzimu.
Umwami Yadukunze Ivy’imbonekarimwe, Abo Yakoranije bos- Abagira bazima. Abakristo ni bo ngingo Z’Umubiri wiWe, Ntacobatandukanya N’Umukiza.

Umwigisha yonanirwa, Umwinjilisti yonanirwa, Abantu bose bonanirwa Ariko Yesu ntAhinduka. (Ngw’iki?).

Yes-inyonga zaWe zera N-isoko y’amahirwe. Mu gihe c’umubabaro, Ur-uburuhukiro.

Yes-ah-Uzoserukira Mu kirere c-ijuru, Biciye mu Nyonga zaWe, Uzotwikwegerako!

Iman-Iradukunda cane, Iman-Iradukunda cane, Iman-Iradukunda cane, Bihebuje. Biri gute?
Chœur : Birengeye uko wodug, Birengey-uko womanua, Birengey-ubwaguke wose; Bimez-uko!
[Nimb-ushak-amahor-amahoro, Nureke Yesu Yinjire;] (x2) Agukurakw-ivyaha, Akugirir-ubuntu Bwo kuguhindura ngw-Aganz- Umutima wawe. Nimb-ushak-amahor-amahoro, Nureke Yesu Yinjire.

Impuzu zera n’inanga, Inzu nziza, igitsibo, Umunezero, ubutunzi, Ndabifise mw’Ijuru. Kuko Yesu Yarankunz- Aranyitangira, Andihir-imyend-i Kaluvari; Ku bw’urukundo rwiW-Ankurakw-icaha. Mbayeho mu muco We wera. Dutambukan-akanyamuneza, Akanyamuneza, akanyamuneza. Dutambukan-akanyamuneza; Turiko turaja mw’Ijuru.

Yesu ni We Mwami Wanje. Ndaririmb-Ubwiza bwiWe. Yandondeye mu gahinga, Angir-uwo bivukana. Yaj-Ava mu Bwiza bwiWe, Ankura mw’ishayo y’isi. Ndahimbawe, ndahiriwe, Mpiriwe muri We.
Yesu n-Umukunzi Wanje, Anderek-aho ndi hose, Akam-Anyihanganira, Akeneye kuncungura. Nama ndaMukurikira, Asangangur-amarushwa. Ndahimbawe, ndahiriwe, Mpiriwe muri We.
Mwami mbega noguh-iki, Ku bw’urukundo Wankunze! Ngomba kuGusukurira, Nkuzigamishe kazoza. Wemer-ubugingo bwanje, Nzokwame ndaKuyoboka. Ndahimbawe, ndahiriwe, Mpiriwe ku bwiWe.

Ubu je ndi ku gicaniro, Ubu je ndi ku gicaniro, Ubu je ndi ku gicaniro, Canteguriwe.
Chœur : Yes-Aracagagur-ingoyi, Yes-Aracagagur-ingoyi, Yes-Aracagagur-ingoyi, Arambohora.
NzoMuhimbaz-imisi yose, NzoMuhimbaz-imisi yose, NzoMuhimbaz-imisi yose, Yarambohoye.
Nzokwama nshima, nshim-Imana, Nzokwama nshima, nshim-Imana, Nzokwama nshima, nshim-Imana, Ni Y-Imbohora.
Nzosemerera Haleluya! Nzosemerera Haleluya! Nzosemerera Haleluya! Kukw-Ambohora.
Sinkekeranya ku Mukiza, Sinkekeranya ku Mukiza, Sinkekeranya ku Mukiza, Ahor-Anyeza.
Ndi ku masezerano yiWe, Ndi ku masezerano yiWe, Ndi ku masezerano yiWe, Ayo Yampaye.
Hakurya ya Yorodani, Mu matongo muri Edeni, Ahar-Igiti c’Ubugingo, Har-amahoro.
Nuze Yes-Aragutumiye, Shika mu cicaro cawe. Kuk-utohitamw-ubu nyene? Niwinjir-uyu musi, Ngw’ino, Yes-Aravuze. Hitamw-ubu nyene. Emer-Ubutumwa Bwiza, Ahay-abemera.

Ndi ku nkombe ya Yorodani; Ndaba kure cane Igihugu c’i Kanani, Aho mfis-itunga.
Chœur : Ngiye mw’isi yasezeranywe, Ngiye mw’isi yasezeranywe; Ni nd-agomba ko tujana? Ngiye mw’isi yasezeranywe.
Mur-ivyo biyaya binini, Hak-umus-uhoraho; Ni ho Yesu Yam-Aganza, Agakur-ijoro.
Nta gihuhusi cank-imbeho Kur-iyo nkombe yera, Ingwar-ingoran-urupfu, Ntibihumvikana.
Ninager-aho hantu heza, Nzoba mpezagiwe. Mbone mu nyonga ha Data, Muruhukiremwo!

Mukiza, Mwungere Mwiza, Tuyoboz-urukundo, Mu kuboko kwaWe Muvyeyi, Wam-Utugaburira.
Chœur : Shimagizwa ,Mwami Mwiza, Twe tur-abaWe Yesu, Tub-abaKwiyeguriye. Shimagizwa Mukiza.
Mu canya c’ubwatsi bwaWe Twamane naWe Mwami. Musi y’igitutu caWe, Tuzigame mu nzira.
Waratwakirany-ubuntu, Twebwe abanyavyaha. Utwez-imitima yacu, Ku bw’ububasha bwaWe.
Dushaka kukuyoboka Mu vy’utugera vyose; Duhaw-ukwizera kwaWe, Vyose birashoboka.
Mukiza Mwungere Mwiza, Utwongeremw-ishaka. Twigan-intambuko zaWe, Wame Uturamira.

Mbony-Umukunzi Mwiza, Umukiza Yesu, Ni W-Arut-incuti zose zo mw’isi, Kirungu co mu biyaya, mbonera muri We Ivyo ngomba: kunyeza no kunkiza. Anyirura mbabaye, Ankiz-amagorwa, Mmukorer-amaganya yanje yose. Haleluya! Kinyenyeri co mu Gitondo, Kirungu co mu biyaya, Ni W-Arut-incuti zose zo mw’isi.
Chœur : Anyirura mbabaye, Ankiz-amagorwa, Mmukorer-amaganya yanje yose. Haleluya! Kinyenyeri co mu Gitondo, Kirungu co mu biyaya, Ni W-Arut-incuti zose zo mw’isi.
Ibimbabaza vyose Yarabinkuyeko, Iyo ngeragezw-Andinda wa Mubi, Ivyama binganza vyose Yarabinkijije, Non-Andindish-ubushobozi bwiWe. Nah-incuti zompeba, Satan-akangeza, Yesu ni W-Azonshikana mw’Ijuru. Haleluya! Kinyenyeri co mu Gitondo, Kirungu co mu biyaya, Ni W-Arut-incuti zose zo mw’isi.
Ntazonsiga nk’imfuvyi; ntaho nzokwibana, Kuko mbeshwaho n’ukwizera gusa, Kukw-Ankikij-Umuriro, singir-ico ntinya. Angaburira manu yo mw’Ijuru. None nkumbuy-umusi nzoshika mw’Ijuru, Nzonezerwa mbonye mu nyonga hiWe. Haleluya! Kinyenyeri co mu Gitondo, Kirungu co mu biyaya, Ni W-Arut-incuti zose zo mw’isi.

Mwam-Utuvubir-imvura, Nk’uko Wasezeranye; Mukiza tUrungikire, Ca gihe c’impemburo.
Chœur : Utuvubir-imvura, Imvura y’umugisha; Turarons-urunyanyaga, Uduh-iy’umuvuvu.
Mwam-Utuvubir-imvura, Imw-itang-ubugingo, Mu matw-irikw-irasuma, Non-Uyidushitseko.
Mwam-Utuvubir-imvura, Iducuncubukeko; Duh-impemburo nyakuri Wadusezeraniye.
Mwam-Utuvubir-imvura, Icomp-igashirako, Ubu tugisenga Mana, Twambaz-Umwami Yesu!

Umbe hafi Mwami, Umbe hafi, N-ukwizera kwanje, Umbe hafi. Uruzi rwuzuye ibingerageza, Ngumya hafi yaWe, Umbe hafi.
Umbe hafi Mwami, Umbe hafi, Mu marushwa yose wam-Undemesha. Ni nagwa mu vyago, Umpe kwihangana; Nshira hafi yaWe, Umbe hafi.
Umbe hafi Mwami, Umbe hafi, Uhor-Untabara name nKwizera Umwans-iy-anteye Uz-Undwanirire Name hafi yaWe, Umbe hafi.
Umbe hafi Mwami, Umbe hafi Wakinguy-Ijuru; nYobor-ah-Uri. Yewe ngenzi, rema, uri mu gukira. Hafi yaWe Mwami, Umbe hafi.

Ntundengane Mukiza We, Wumv-uko nganya, Ah-Ugendera mu bandi, Nanje ntunsige.
Chœur : Yesu Mukiza, Wumv-uko nganya, Ah-Ugendera mu bandi, Nanje ntUnsige.
Mpa kweger-intebe yaWe Mpabw-imbabazi, Ngupfukamiye mbabaye, Mpa kukwizera.
Nta wundi nokwizigira, Ni WeWe ngomba, Mvur-ibikomere vyanje, Kand-Umparire.
Ur-iSoko y’amahoro, Nyenubugingo, Singir-uwundi nambaza Atari WeWe!

Ni twigumanire, Mwami Mwiza cane, Ijwi ryaWe ryiza Rizan-amahoro.
Chœur : Twaman-imisi yose Yesu, ndaKugomba, Mukiza, n-amahirwe Ni twagumana!
Ni twigumanire Nyenubushobozi; Ntsind-amosha mabi Iyo turi kumwe.
Ni twigumanire, Ngany-Utari hano: Ngwin-ubu tubane, Mbone gutungana.
Ni twigumanire, Nyigish-ivy-Ugomba, Imihango mibi Yos-Uyinkureko.
Ni twigumanire Mwami Nyenukwera, Nyobora mb-uwaWe, WeWe Munyehirwe.

NdaKugomba Mukiza We, Nta ho mbasha kwijana, Nifuza k-Umpora hafi, Ukaj-Urankomeza.
Chœur : Sinzogir-ico ntinya, Yesu, njan-ah-Ugomba, Nta ho nzogenda ngimira, NguKurikir-ah-Uja.
NdaKugomba Mukiza We, Ndiyoroheje cane, Ni WeWe gus-Undemesha, Nta wundi mbizigako.
NdaKugomba Mukiza We, Aho ndi mur-iyi si: Mw’isegenya no kuzuba, Mu vyago no mu vyiza.
NdaKugomba Mukiza We, Undongore mu nzira, Nshitsa kuri Yorodani, Utek-Urunjabutse.
Ijwi ryaWe ry’urukundo Ni Ryo Rimp-ukwizera. Iyo ntewe n’intege nke, Ndushaho gukomezwa.
Mbatijwe na Mpwemu waWe, Unyambits-inkomezi. Namamaze kubohoka Kw’imitim-imenetse.

Mbeg-uramaze guhura na Yesu? Wogejwe mu Maraso yiWe? Mbeg-urizey-uBuntu bwiWe neza? Wogejwe mu Maraso yiWe?
Chœur : Wogejwe na Yesu, Mu Maraso Yez-imitima? Mbeg-imyambaro yaw-irera neza? Wogejwe mu Maraso yiWe?
Mbeg-ugendana na W-imisi yose? Wogejwe mu Maraso yiWe? Mbega wibera mu Wakubambiwe? Wogejwe mu Maraso yiWe?
Mbeg-Umukwe ni Yaz-Azogusanga Wambay-impuzu zera neza? Umutima waw-uzob-uteguwe? Wogejwe mu Maraso yiWe?
Iyambur-impuzu zose zanduye, Ni wezwe mu Maraso yiWe! Isoko yez-iracadudubiza, Ni wezwe mu Maraso yiWe!

Mbega ntugomba guturw-ivyaha? Har-inkomezi mu Maraso. Ntugomba kandi kunesh-umubi? Ayo Maras-Arakiza.
Chœur : Har-inkomezi zitangaje Mu Maraso ya Yesu, Har-inkomezi zitangaje Mu Maraso y’Umukiza.
Mbega ntiwamy-uri n’amanyama? Har-inkomezi mu Maraso.Wezwe mw’isoko y’i Gologota; Ayo Maras-Arakiza.
Mbega ntugomba kwera derere? Har-inkomezi mu Maraso.Ni Yo gusa Yoz-ico ry’ivyaha; Ayo Maras-Arakiza.
Mbega ntugomba kuMuyoboka? Har-inkomezi mu Maraso. Ntugomba guhor-uMuhimbaye? Ayo Maras-Arakiza.

Yesu, ndacibuk-umusi Mwiza naKwemereyeko Kw-ari WeWe Mana Yanje, Ni vyo nezererwa cane.
Chœur : Mpimbaze, mpimbaze, Yesu Yanyogej-ivyaha; Anyigisha kuMusenga Bituma mpora nezerwa, Mpimbaze, mpimbaze Yesu Yanyogej-ivyaha.
Wahejeje kuncungura, None nd-uwaWe Mukiza; Ni WeWe Wampamagaye, Numvis-Ijwi ryaWe ryiza.
Nezerwa mutima wanje, Hezagirwa, b-amahoro! Ntuz-uhemukir-Umwami, Wegukir-iragi ryiWe.
Nasezeranije Yesu Guhora nkor-ivy-Agomba. Ni nashika no ku mpfiro, Sinzoreka kunezerwa.

Nezerewe ko menye rwose Yesu kw-Ar-Umukiza Wanje! Ni We Yancunguj-Amaraso, Ndizera mvuk-ubwa kabiri.
Chœur : Yambwiye ko nd-umunyavyaha, Ndihana ndizer-Arankiza, Ni vyo ndirimba, ni vyo mvuga, Nshim-Umukiz-imisi yose.
Nganzwa na Yesu, ndahimbawe! Ndi mw’iyerekwa ry’izamurwa! Hamanuts-Abamarayika Bazany-ivy-Urukundo rwiWe.
Nganzwa na Yesu, nd-amahoro; Mpiriwe n’uko mba muri We! Mpora nitez-ivyiz-Azompa Bivuye mu Rukundo rwiWe.
Kubimenya ni kwiza rwose: Nd-uwa Yesu, sinkekeranya. Nzigamwa n’Ushobora vyose, NkiMwizera ntawoMunyaga.

Mbeg-ukunt-Umwami Wanje Yemeye kumpfira! Yatanz-Ubugingo Bwera Ku musiba nka nje.
Chœur : Ku musaraba wiWe ni ho naturiwe Umutwaro w’ivyaha vyanje: Nizeye ndahumuka mbon-Umuco, Ku bw’ivyo mpora nezerewe.
Mbe ni ku bw’ivyaha vyanje Yambabarijw-Atyo? N-ikigongwe, n-urukundo Bitangaje rwose!
Izuba ryacuz-umwiza, Rirahish-ubwiza, Igihe Krist-Umuremyi Yarikw-Adupfira.
Ukwicuza kwanje kwose Ntikworih-umwenda Ngufitiye, Mwami Wanje, Ehe ndaKwihaye!

Mpore nizigira gusa Amaraso y’Umukiza. Nta rufatiro ruriho, Atari Yesu wenyene.
Chœur : Nshingwe kur-UrWo Rutare; Nay-ahandi n-umusenyi, Nay-ahandi n-umusenyi.
N-iy-umwiza wompumisha, Nizer-imbabazi ziWe; Mu vyago no mu marushwa, Ndazi ko Yes-Atazonta.
Ndemeshwa can-umutima N’ivyo Yansezeranije, Nah-ivyanje vyotikira, Ni We gusa nizigiye.
Maz-ico gih-Azozira, Az-Asange ndi muri We, Nambay-ukugororoka, Ata n’agasembwa mfise.

Har-iGihugu ciza cane, Twasezeraniwe n’Imana; Tukirorere twizigiye, Kuko Data Yakitweretse.
Chœur : Aheza mw’Ijuru, Tuzohurirayo bagenzi, Aheza mw’Ijuru, Tuzohurirayo bagenzi.
Tuzoririmbira mw’Ijuru Indirimbo z’abahiriwe. Ntituzongera kubabara, Tuzoba dushiz-amarira.
Tuzoshimira Data cane Imbabazi Yatugiriye, N’Ubuntu bwiWe n’Urukundo, N’Imigisha Yacuncubuye.

Ingo mwa bahizi mwe, Ja mu rugamba, Ni wa musaraba Uturongoye: Kristo n-Umugabisha Atuj-imbere, Ngo tugende, fat-imyampi, Hang-ibendera.
Chœur : Mwa bahizi b’Umwami Yesu Je mu rugamba, Eh-umusaraba Uturongoye.
Tur-ingabo ziremye, Turakomeye, Duca ah-abera Baciye kera; Nta wuzodusanzaza, Turakundanye; Turahuje mu nyigisho No mu kwizera.
Kand-ingaji zo kw’isi Zizohangura, Arikw-iya Yesu Ntizohangura, Amarembo y’umwansi Ntiyotunesha; Dutsimbatajwe n’isezerano Rya Kristo.
Intsinzi n-iyacu, Emwe Bakristo! Satan-arahung- Ijambo twizeye! Inkingi z’ikuzimu Zirasenyutse; Duz-amajwi, semerere, Tuvuz-impundu!
Ni muze bantu mwese, Mu munezero. Tuje hamwe twese, Kwigin-intsinzi, Yemwe bamarayika, Ni mudufashe Gutazira Krist-Umwami, Ubudashira.

Ni muvyuke kurwana Mwa ntore z’Umwami, Mutwar-ibirwanishwa Vyos-Iman-Itanga. Mu nzira yo kunesha Turongorwa na Yesu: Kuko Yadutsindiye Tunesha ku bwiWe.
Inzamba zirayaze, Mwese mutabare, Mugend-akabushungwe, Ntimub-ibijora. Naho mwosugerezwa N’ingabo za Satani, Mureme mu mitima, Nta nganji zifise.
Muvyuke mutabare, Mushikame cane, Inkomezi z’inyamaSi zo turwanisha: Muhagatir-inkota,Ni ryo jambo ry’Imna, N’ibindi birwaniswaVy’uburyo bwa Mpwemu.
Kand-urugamba rwanyu Ruzoshira vuba,Ubu har-akaruru, Ejo ho n’impundu! Uneshej-azohabwa Igitsibo na Yesu, Azicarana na WeKu ntebe y’uBwami.
Mushirek-ubu nyene,Murwane, muneshe. Mwizer-Izina Ryera, Rirabakomeza. Maz-ivyo birwanishwa Mubih-Umwami Yesu, Muzobon’amahoro Y’Imana mw’Ijuru.

Mwam-ubugingo bwacu ni nk’umusi, Ni bugufi rwose, ntiburamba, Ibinezera vyabwo birashira; Mwam-Udahinduka tugumane.
Gumana nanje, kuk-umus-ukuze, Raba burije ntunsige nd-umwe. Nta wundi nizigiye yontabara, Tugumane Mwami, tugumane.
Nantaryo Mukiza ni WeWe ngomba, Tutabanye Satani yonesha, Ububasha bwaWe ni bwo bunkiza, Tugumane Mwami, tugumane.
Umpoze hafi nta mwansi notinya, Kand-amarushwa ntiyombabaza, Warakuyeh-uruboyi rw’urupfu, Tugumane Mwami, tugumane.
Mwami no ku musi nzocikanako, Nzobon-ubwiza bwaWe mw’Ijuru. Ni ho nzoba mvuye mu mwiza w’isi, No mu rupfu Mwami, tugumane.

Kw-ar-ubuntu butovugwa Yukw-Iman-Iharira! Kand-umunyavyaha nka nje, Nkagirw-imbabazi! Ndaje Yesu, kuri WeWe! Uko ndi kos-Unyakire! Ndaje Yesu, kuri WeWe! Mukiz-Unyakire!
Nahoze ndi kure yaYo, Nkiz-umutima wanje; Arik-uwaYo Mutima, Nkama ndawubabaza.
None Yesu ndakwihaye, Umbohor-Undokore! NKura mu migozi yose Satani yantayemwo.
Haleluya, singitinya, Nta mazinda ngifise! Ndi mu nzir-ija mw’Ijuru, Nuzuy-umunezero!

Yesu, Mukiza wanje, Nguhany-akaneza Uyu mubiri wanje Ng-ub-uwaWe wose. Emer-ico nshikanye Mukunzi w’Imana, Utume Mpwemu Yera Aze kuri jewe.
Sintinya no kuguha Ubugingo bwanje, Ku bw’imbabazi zaWe, Mucunguzi wanje.
Kand-umuriro musha Wake muri jewe, Umare mu mutima Ibitar-ivyaWe.
Yesu Mwam-Uze vuba, Ube Databuja, Mb-uwaW-imisi yose, Kuk-Uzam-Unkunda.

Muz-abakund-Imana, Mwes-abanezerewe, Fatanya natwe gushima No kuririmbir-Umwami Dukikij-Intebe Y’Ubuntu bwa Yesu. Tugan-i Siyoni, Siyoni n-Umurwa mwiza, Tuduga tugan-i Siyoni Wa Murwa w’Imana mwiza.
Abatameny-Imana, Ni banke kuririmba! Arikw-abana b’Umwami, Nta cobabuza gushima No gukwiz-agakiz- Iman-Ibahaye.
Umurwa w’i Siyoni Wuzuy-ivyiza vyinshi, Tukiri mu nzir-ijayo, Tutaraca mu kirimba, Twumva tubifise Mu mitima yacu.
Ririmba, vuz-impundu, Ni mut-ubwob-inyuma: Urugendo rwacu ruca Mu bwatsi bwa Imanweli, Mw’Is-irut-izindi, Mw’Ijuru ku Mana.

Nnezerewe ko Data wa twese Yammenyeshej-Urukundo rwiWe; Mu vyiz-Imana Yavuze vyose Nta kirut-iki ko Yes-Ankuda. Nezerewe ko Yes-Ankunda, Arankunda, Arankunda, Nezerewe ko Yes-Ankunda, Naho ntabikwiye.
Iyo nzimiye nkaMubabaza, Ntareka kunkunda, ntabikwiye, Kand-ikinsubiz-aho Yes-Ari N-uko nibuk-Urukundo rwiWe.
Ni nashik-i We mu bwiza bwiWe, Nzama ndirimb-ik-imisi yose? Nzama Mubazish-indirimbo nti Yesu n-iki ca kunkundishije?
Kand-urukundo ni rwo rwazanye Yesu kuncunguz-urupfu rubi, Kokw-Arankunda, ndabizi neza, Nanje ndaMukunda ndaMushima.

Ni vyiza kuGukorera Mukiza Wanje. Ni ryo shikanwa nshikanye, Riranezera.
Chœur : Akir-ubugingo bwanje, N-ubwaWe Yesu; Kandi ku bw’Ubuntu bwaWe Undind-umubi.
Mwam-ico nifuza cane N-Ukwera kwaWe. Nta kindi ngikund-atari KuGukorera.
Ngomba kugukorera nka Za ntumwa zaWe, NGukurikire Mukiza, NKwubahe rwose.
Singitiny-umubabaro N’ibindi vyago; Ni WeWe kwizera kwanje, N’ivyiza vyanje.
Twese tuj-imbere hamwe Muri bwa bwiza; Turirimban-indirimbo, Twame tunesha.

Yesu, ndaGukunze rwose, ndaKwihaye, Ndahevy-ibihimbaro vy’ivyaha vyanje, Ni WeWe Mukiza Wanje mwiza, nKuyoboke; Nta ho nari nigeze kuGukunda nk’ubu.
Mu mutima numva NdaGukunze cane Kukw-ari WeWe Wabanje kudukunda; Ubugingo bwaWe bwamberey-Ikimazi, Nta ho nari nigeze kuGukunda nk’ubu.
Waremeye kumpfira ku Musaraba, Kugira ngo mparirwe ivyaha vyanje; NGukundiy-amahwa Wanyambariye mu mutwe: Nta ho nari nigeze kuGukunda nk’ubu.
NzoGukunda nkiriho, n’aho nzopfira: Ngihumeka sinzobura kuGushima, N’iyo nzoba ndiko ndapfa, nzoKubarira nti, Nta ho nari nigeze kuGukunda nk’ubu.
Maze ni nashika mu rugo rwa Data Rurimwo ya mazu Waduteguriye, Nzunam-imbere y’Inyonga zaWe ndirimba nti, Nta ho nari nigeze kugukunda nk’ubu.

Nahabiye kure yaWe, Ndahabuts-ubu; Natevye cane mu vyaha: Mwami nyakira.
Chœur : Nj-ah-Uri nihanye, Singisubira; Nteg-ibiganza vyaWe: Mwami nyakira.
Napfapfany-imyaka myinshi, Ndahabuts-ubu; Ndakwitwayeko nihanye: Mwami nyakira.
Ivyaha birandambiye, Ndahabuts-ubu; Nishimiy-Ubuntu bwaWe: Mwami nyakira.
Numva ndwaye mu mutima, Ndahabuts-ubu; Mvur-Unsubizemw-intege: Mwami nyakira.
Nta wundi nokwizigira, Ndahabuts-ubu; Yesu, Waranyitangiye: Mwami nyakira.
Nkeney-Amaraso yaWe, Ndahabuts-ubu; Unyeze nere derere: Mwami nyakira.

Mukiza, numv-is-Ijwi RyaWe ry’imbabazi Rimpamagara ngo nozwe N’Amaraso yaWe.
Chœur : Nditavye Yesu, Ndaje Mukiza; Ngw-Amaraso wavuye Anyez-antunganye.
Ndazi ko mfis-ivyaha Vyinshi mu mutima; Vyose ndabikuzaniye, Naw-Ubinkureko.
Kand-Uramp-umutima Wuzuy-urukundo, Wuzuy-ukwizera kwose N’amahoro menshi.
Ndazi k-Uzomfashisha Imbabazi nyinshi, Ivyo Wansezeranije, Bizoshika vyose.
Nshim-Amaraso yaWe Ankuyekw-ivyaha, Mpimbaza n’ubushobozi Bunkiz-intege nke.

Iy-urushe, iy-uremerewe, Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Araguhay-Umutima wiWe: Bibwire Yesu nyene!
Chœur : Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Ni We Mukunzi Wawe, Nta wundi wobona hafi yawe, Bibgire Yesu nyene!
Ayo marira n’ayo marushwa: Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Har-icaha wari wanyegeje? Bibwire Yesu nyene!
Iy-ukumbuye bimwe vya kera: Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Ni W-Afut-ivyaha vyawe vyose. Bibwire Yesu nyene!
Uratinya k’urupfu ruzoza? Bibwire Yesu! Bibwire Yesu! Iyumvir-ingene Yes-Azoza. Bibwire Yesu nyene!

Uwishinze ku vyasezeranijwe N’Umukiza wac-aronk-amahoro, Kand-aririmbishwa n’umunezero, Kuko yizey-ibihoraho.
Chœur : Twizigiye Ivyasezeranijwe na Yesu wacu; Nta ho, nta ho Ashobora kuduhemukira.
Ivyasezeranijwe n’Uhoraho Biragumy-umwansi ntabishobora, Ntidukekeranya, ntadutinyisha, Kuko twizey-ibihoraho.
Ivyasezeranijwe n’Umukiza Bimbwira kw-Amaraso yiW-Anyoza Ivyaha vyanje vyose, sinandure, Kuko nizey-Uwancunguye.
Ivyasezeranijwe n’Umukiza Bitum-urukundo rwiWe rungumya, Inkota ya Mpwemu ni Yo ndwanisha, Ihor-Innesherez-umubi.
Uwishinze ku vyasezeranijwe Ni w-ahora yumvira Mpwemu Yera, Satani ntashobora kumutsinda, Kuko yizigiy-Uhoraho.

Mbega tuzokoranira Ku ruzi ruvugwa rwiza, Ruca mw’Ijuru hagati, Ruv-imbere y’Intebe y’Imana?
Chœur : Ego me tuzobonana Kur-urwo ruzi rwiza rw’Ubugingo, Ego tuzobonana n’Abera Imbere y’Intebe y’Imana.
Ahar-urwo ruzi rwiza Tuzibanira n’Umwami. Nta mubabar-uzobayo Mur-iyo Nganji y’Ubwiza bwinshi.
Tuzogendana ku nkombe Y’urwo ruzi rw’ubugingo, Tuzoseng-Imana Yacu, TuYihimbaza tuYitazira.
Yemwe, tutarahashika Tuzoturw ibitugoye, Ubuntu buzodukiza, Buzotwambik’impuzu z’ubukwe.
Tuzohurira n’abera Ku ruzi rubonerana, Nta kizodutandukanya, Kuk-urupfu rutaja mw’Ijuru.
N-uko tuzoshika vuba Kuri rurya ruzi rwiza, Tuzoririmban-ishimwe Twuzuyemw-amahoro n’ineza.

Bari baje gukorana, Nta ndobeke yarimwo, Mpwemu Yera ni ho Yaza Atumwe n’Imana.
Chœur : Mwami, tuma non-aha Inkomezi za Mpwemu, Umubatizo n-uyo, Ubatize wese.
Inkomezi zo mw’Ijuru Zaraje kuri bo Nk’umucanwa watse rwose Uzanywe na Mpwemu.
Barahaw-Umubatizo Barorereyeyo, Kuko bari biteguye, Nta caha carimwo.
Nk’ukw-abo bavyeyi bacu Bahaw-inkomezi, Riracar-Isezerano Ku wizera wese.

Umve rya Jwi ry’Umwungere, Ni We Yes-Umutabazi; Arahamagay-intama, Zashaye mu vyaha vyinshi.
Chœur : Zizane, zizane, Izo ntama ziri mu vyaha; Zizane, zizane, Zana zose kuri Yesu. (Zan-abana kuri Yesu.).
Uzofasha Yesu mbega, Kuzan-abo banyavyha? Yadutumye twebwe twese, Turonder-abazimiye.
Abantu benshi bagenda Mu nzira zose z’ivyaha; Yesu ngo Gend-ubazane, Ngomba ko bamber-intama.

Nariko ndadobera Mu ruzi rw’urupfu, Ntwawe n’ibicumuro, Nibizwa n’ivyaha; Hanyuma mbona Yesu, Ndamuborogera: Ac-Ancakira vuba, Arankiza!
Chœur : Nakijijwe n’urukundo, Nta wundi Mutabazi atari We! Nakijijwe n’urukundo, Nta wundi Mutabazi Atari We!
Neneho ni nashika Mu magorwa menshi, Nzi kw-atazondengera: Yes-Azontabara; Azommaramw-ubwoba, Azomp-ivyo nkennye: Nkwiye kuririmba no KuMusenga.
Wa munt-uri mw’irinde, Rangamiza none; Yesu ni We Mukiza, Arakurokora. Ni W-Aganz-imikuba Ntiz-igutembane; Non-Agomba kugukiza: Emera!

Ndazi ko Yes-Ankunda, Vyanditswe mu Gitabo, Nd-uwo mu bana biWe, Kand-Arambungabunga.
Chœur : Yes-Arankunda, Yes-Arankunda, Yes-Arankunda, Ni We Yabimbwiye.
Yarankunz-Arampfira, Arankurakw-ivyaha; Yaciy-Anjishurira Ibirimba vy’Ijuru.
Arankunda na ntaryo. Ndwaye nkabur-intege, Araza kuntabara, Aj-Avuye mw’Ijuru.

Yesu ntAhinduka, ntAhinduka, ntAhinduka; Yesu ntAhinduka, oyaye!
Yesu Yampariye, Yampariye, Yampariye; Yeu Yampariye, cane pe!
Yesu ni W-Ampaza, ni W-Ampaza, ni W-Ampaza; Yesu ni W-Ampaza, ego me!
Yes-Azonyakir-Azonyakir-Azonyakira; Yes-Azonyakira mw’Ijuru.
Ni We tuzobana, tuzobana, tuzobana; Ni We tuzobana nshitseyo.
Yesu nAhimbazwe, nAhimbazwe, nAhimbazwe; Yesu nAhimbazwe, nAshimwe.

Har-umwanya woha Yesu Yakwikorerey-ivyaha? Ng’UYo-Arikw-Araramutsa, Mbega ntiWomwijiza?
Chœur : Shitsa Yesu mu mutima, Itab-Ijambo ryiWe; Mwugururire n’ingoga, Bikigushobokera.
Mu mutim-ufis-umwanya W’ibiguhambara bindi, Ariko Yesu Yabambwe Nta mwany-uMufitiye.
Har-umwanya w’ivya Yesu Wobonana gucurumba? Ubu n-igihe gikwiye, UMwitab-uMwinjize.
Uhe Yes-umwanya none, Igihe ntikikurenge. Utarahav-uteterwa: Ngw-Ahebe kukwinginga.

Nzama nganyira Yes-ibingoye, Sinzovyihererana nd-umwe, Mmutakambiye yoc-Antabara Kukw-Ankunda nd-umwana wiWe.
Chœur : Nzama nganyira Yes-ibingoye, Sinzovyihererana nd-umwe, Nzama nganyira Yes-ibingoye, Simfis-uwundi Mutabazi.
Nzama nganyira Yes-ibingoye, Ni We Mugenz-Arut-abandi, MbiMwiganiye Yoc-abinkiza, Azondemesha mu mutima.
Ndi n’ibindwanya bingerageza, Ariko mfise n’Umukiza, Ivyahora bimbabaza kera, Vyose nabiremetse Yesu.
Is-irageza kunyosha nabi, Satan-akaz-agir-ansuke, Ariko ntakambiy-Umukiza, Ampa kunesha mkabitsinda.

Iyo har-amarushwa mensh-ateye, Mukihebura ko mutagikira, Muce muharur-imigisha yanyu, Izobatanganz-ingen-ari myinshi.
Chœur : Muharur-imigisha yanyu, Ntimusige n’umwe muri yo, Iy-Imana Yabaronkeje Irabatangaz-ingen-ari myinshi.
Mbega muremerewe n’amaganya? Mugira ngo ntimwovyihanganira? Muharuy-imigisha muririmba, Ntimwomeny-iyo yamanganiye.
Mw’isi har-itunga nk’inka n’ibindi, Arikw-irya Yesu rirabiruta, Itunga ryo mw’isi ntiryoduhesha Gukizw-ivyaha no kuja mw’Ijuru.
Amarushwa naho yoba menshi ate, Ntimwihebur-Imana-Irabakiza, Mwibuk-imigisha yany-ukw-ingana, Irabibagiz-amagorwa yose.

Tur-ihanga ry’Iman-Ihoraho, Twaguzw-Amaraso Ye Yamenywe kuber-ivyaha vyacu, Yaduhinduy-aBe.
Duhura n’isegenya, n’imiyaga, Ariko ntidutinya; Twubatse ku Rutare ruhoraho, Ntitunyiganyizwa.
Tugenda mw’Izina ry’Uwanesheje, Izina rya Yesu; N-Umunyenkomezi hagati yacu; Tuguma tunesha.
Dukobeje mw’Izina ry’Uwanesheje, Tuja mu Murwa Yerusalemu, Ahatar-inzar-inyota n’amakuba; Yerusalemu yo mw’Ijuru.
Dukomejwe na Mpwemu Yera Ku bw’Ubuntu bw’Imana, Kuko twatoranijwe kera; Tugumye kub-aBe.
Dutway-Izina ry’Uwanesheje Rihindish-i kuzimu, Rijanjangur-inkomezi z’Antikritso, Rigakiz-ivyaha.
Tugiye vuba kumen-ibicu, Twitez-izamurwa; Tuzokwamana n’Umwami Yesu, Ibihe bidashira.

Yes-Arahamagarany-urukundo, Arondera je na wewe, Kandi Yiteguriye kutwakira, Eh-Ahagaze ku rugi.
Chœur : Garuka, garuka, Ngw-in-i Muhir-uruhuke; Yes-Umukiz-Araguhamagaye: «Ngw-i Muhira, munyavyaha.».
Yes-Arakwinginze ntutebagane, Yinginga wewe na jewe, Ntufate minenerw-ihamagarwa; Duhamagawe n’Ubuntu.
Ibihe vyacu birihuta cane, Bibandanya bidusiga. Haj-umwijima n’ijoro ry’urupfu, Biziriye je na wewe.
Mbeg-urukundo rutangaje cane! Nk’uko Yabisezeranye, Ku bw’Ubunt-Araduharir-ivyaha, Aharira je na wewe.

Ntanganzwa n’ubuntu bw’Imana Burengey-ivyaha nakoze, Bwasutswe mw’is-i Gologota, Ni bwo Maraso y’Umukiza.
Chœur : Wa buntu we butangaje! Buntu bwo kunyez-umutima! Wa buntu we butangaje! Burengey-ivyaha nakoze.
Nariko ndadobera rwose Mu ruzi rw’urupfu n’ivyaha, Maz-ubuntu bw’Imana bwinshi Bundobesha wa Musaraba.
Sinshobora guhish-ivyaha: Nokura heh-icobinyoza? Raba rwa ruzi rw’Amaraso, Wisukemwo ng’ubone kwera.
Rab-ubwo buntu butangaje, Burenz-ubwo twomenya bwose, Yew-ugomba gukizwa rwose, Ntiwokwakir-ubwo buntu se?

Ndashim-isoko y’Amaraso Yahishuriw-abanyavyaha. Ndashima Umwana w’Imana, Imishishagu yiW-irakiza. Sinari mu mukuku wiWe; Nababaz-umutima wanje. Nyoza mu Maraso ya Yesu, Maze nce nera derere.
Chœur : Nere derere! Nere derere! Nyoza mu Maraso ya Yesu, Mpeze, nce nera derere.
Data, narabay-icangazi, Naragiye kure yaWe. Ivyaha vyanje vy’umutuku Ntivyoshobora kwozwa n’amazi. Yesu ndaje kw’isoko yaWe; Nta bindi vyizigiro mfise, Nyoza mu Maraso ya Yesu, Maze nce nera derere.

Ivy’isi vyamvuye mu mutima, Ku bw’Amaraso nta gakacira, Nunamy-imbere y’Umusaraba, Amaraso ya Yesu ni y-Anyeza de.
Chœur : NdaMukunda, ndaMukunda Kuko Yabanje kunkunda, Yarandonkey-agakiza Ku git- i Kaluvari.
Nari nadobereye mu vyaha, Nar-umuja w’ivyifuzo vyanje, Narahung-Imana kand-Inkunda: None Yesu Yabinkujekw-Amaraso.
Nar-imbohe, ubu ndigegemvya, Nar-impumyi noneho ndabona, Nari mpfuye, none ndi muzima: Ni mwumv-ayo mahoro Yesu Yampaye.

Sinterw-isoni n’Ubutumwa, Ni bwo bubasha bw’Imana. Sinterw-isoni n’Ubutumwa, Ni bwo bubasha bw’Imana Bwo gukiz-uwizera wese, Bwo gukiz-uwizera wese eee; Sinterw-isoni n’Ubutumwa, Ni bwo bubasha bw’Imana.
Umunezer-umunezero Mu mutima, Wuzuy-umutima, Wuzuy-umutima. Umunezer-umunezero Mu mutima, Yesu nAhimbazwe!

Wambabarijwe ku giti, Unkunda nd-umwana muto! Wagomba mbeshweho naWe Yes-Umwami Wanje.
Chœur : Yesu, Yesu, ndaGukunda. Yesu, Yesu, ndaGukunda. Yesu, Yesu, ndaGukunda, Ur-Umwami Wanje.
Sinokwibagir-Umwami! Ni Mwiza Yarampfiriye! Nzokwama Mukurikira, Yes-Umwami Wanje.
Noneh-ub-Uri mu bwiza, Warampay-ivyizigiro Ko ngiye kubon-Umwami, S-uwundi ni WeWe.

Sinz-igituma Yampishuriye Ubuntu ntangere, Kuber-iki Kristo Yankuz-atyo, Akangir-uwiWe.
Chœur : Ariko ndaz-UWO nizeye, Sinkekeranya yukw-Ashoboye Kuzigam-ico naMuhaye Kugez-ah-Azozira.
Sinzi ukuntu Yabigenjeje, Nkaronk-ukwizera, Nkaronk-amahoro mu mutima Ku bw’Ijambo ryiWe.
Sinzi ukuntu Mpwemu Akora Mu kwemez-abantu, Ukunt-Abahishurira Yesu, BakanaMwizera.
Sinz-ikintu ciza canke kibi Coshika kuri je, Nkanezerwa canke nkababara NkiMurindiriye.
Sinz-umus-Umwam-Azozirako N’isah-Azozira. Nimba nzoba ndi mu bazozurwa Canke ndi muzima.

Amaso yanje yabony-ukuza kw’Uhoraho Arikw-Aganish-inzabib-uburake bwiWe, Yerekan-ukuravya kw’Inkota yiW-ikaze, Ukuri kurabandanya.
Chœur : Shimwa! Shimwa, Haleluya! Shimwa! Shimwa, Haleluya! Shimwa! Shimwa, Haleluya! Ukuri kurabandanya.
Nabony-Azigujwe n’ibirimi vy’umuriro, BaMwubakiy-igicaniro ku kagoroba. Ndabon-amatara y’uguc-amateka kwiWe, Umusi wiW-urashitse.
Yavugij-inzamb-itiger-isubizw-inyuma, Ases-imitima y’abant-Acir-urubanza. Ewe mutima wanje wihute kuMwitaba, Imana ng’iY-Irashitse.
Krist-Asa neza Yavukiye hino, hakuno. Ubwiza bwiWe butuma twe dukayangana. Ni dupfe kuk-urupfu rwiWe rurez-abantu, Imana ng’Iy-Irashitse.

Rema busho buto, Yarabarondeye, Yapfiriy-abiWe urw’umusaraba, Azobashikana ku ntebe y’Ubwami, Afis-Ububasha kw’isi no mw’Ijuru.
Chœur : Izere gusa, izere gusa, Vyose birashoboka, izere gusa. Izere gusa, izere gusa, Vyose birashoboka, izere gusa. (Mwami, ndizeye…) (Mana, ndizeye…) (Yesu ni h-Ari…).
Rema busho buto, Yakugiy-imbere, Umwungere Wawe, Yaraciy-inzira; Amazi y’i Mara, Azoyahindura, Yanywerey-umururaz-i Getsemane.
Rema busho buto, uko vyoba kwose, Ahora Yinjira ahugaye hose, We ntAheb-abiWe, Yam-Ar-aho bari, BakaMwizigir-umurango n’ijoro.

Twiyumvamw-inez-iyo Tuvug-ivy’iyi Nzira, Twiyumvamw-inez-iyo Tuvug-ivya Yesu; Dukovye, dukovye Kuvug-ivy’iyi Nzira. Dukovye, dukovye Kuvug-ivya Yesu.
Satani ntagomba ko Tuvug-ivy’iyi nzira Satani ntagomba ko Tuvug-ivya Yesu (Ahubwo) Dukovye, dukovye Kuvug-ivy’iyi Nzira Dukovye, dukovye Kuvug-ivya Yesu.

Ndihuta ngana mw’Ijuru, Buri musi nguma nduzwa; Nama nseng-imisi yose Nti “Mwami nduza hejuru.”
Chœur : Nduza Mwami mu kwizera, Unshikan-iyo hejuru Ahataramutse neza; Nshikana, Mwami, hejuru.
Sinshaka ko mu mutima Nguman-ugukekeranya, Naho bamwe babikunda; Je ngomba kuduzwa kure.
Singume matanye n’isi, Icibare ca wa Mubi; Ndarangamije mw’Ijuru, Nzoshikayo mu kwizera.
Nshikana ku gasongero, Mbon-ubwiza burengeje; Ntaranabona mw’Ijuru, Mwami ndugana hejuru.

Mbe nd-ingabo y’Umusaraba Umwigishwa wa Yesu? Mbe ntinya kuMushigikira Kuvug-Izina Rye?
Chœur : Intambar-irangiye, Tuzambikw-igitsibo! Tuzambikw-igitsibo! Tuzambikw-igitsibo! Intambar-irangiye,Tuzambikw-igitsibo Muri Yerusalemu nsha. Igitsibo, igitsibo Gisayangana cane; Intambar-irangiye, tuzambikw-igitsibo Muri Yesusalemu nsha.
Mbega nzoduganwa mw’Ijuru Ndibamye mu vyiza, Abandi baca mu maraso, Barwanir-impera?
Mbega nta bansi, nta mikuba Mbwirizwa kunesha? Mb-is-ifatanije n’ubuntu Kunjana mw’ Ijuru?
Ndwana kugira ngo nze nganze, Mwami ng’Undemeshe Nzihanganir-imibabaro Mfashijwe n’Ijambo.

Muze tuvug-ivya Yesu, Umwami w’abami, Uganz-abaganza Ibihe bidashira.
Chœur : Ni We NDIHO n’inzira, Ubugingo be n’Ukuri, Muze tuvug-ivya Yesu cane rwose.
Muze tuvug-ivya Yesu, Bose bamamaze Ububasha bwose Bw’Iryo Zina ryiza. Yavukiy-i Betelehemu, Kinyenyeri c’igitondo, Dutazir-Izina ryiWe kw’isi yose.
Muze tuvug-ivya Yesu, Mutsima w’Ubugingo, N-Umukiza w’isi, Umunyagalilaya. Umuvugishw-Akab-Umwami, Mushoboravyose, Ni We Soko y’Amazi y’Ubugingo.
Muze tuvug-ivya Yesu, Mwami w’Amahoro, Muganga Mukuru, Wo mu bihe vyose. Kirungu co mu biyaya, Shurwe ry’i Sharoni, Ni We Mwungere Mwiz-Azi kuyobora.
Muze tuvug-ivya Yesu, Gitandara camaho, Yagiy-i Golgot- Akiz-abanyavyaha. Emanwel-Ahambaye, We Jambo w’Imana, Ni We Mana y’ukuri, Mugabo Wacu.

Nyigisha, Mwami, kurindira Mpfukamye ndi ku mavi; Nihangane kugez-ah-Uzonyishurira. Nyigisha kutibanda Ku vy’abandi bakora; Ariko ndindir-inyishu yaWe nsenga.
Chœur : Abiteg-Uhorah-Imana Bazokwiyubura mu nkomezi, Bazogurukish-amababa nk’inkona, Bazokwiruka ntibaruhe, Bagende ntibadendebukirwe; Nyigisha, Mwami, menye kurindira.
Nyigisha, Mwami, kurindira, Sindurumb-umutima, Mpa kwicisha bugufi, nambaz-Izina ryaWe. Nyubura mu kwizera, NdaGuhang-amaso, Mfash-aha kw’isi mbe nk’uko WeW-Ugomba.

Naratakaj-icubahiro Kuva mpevy-icaha Nta bagenzi kuv-aho Nakiririy-Umukiza, Bandengana nk’ingenzi Kandi bahora bantwengera, Bavuga ko nasaze, ko narenganywe n’igihe.
Chœur : Naradomwekw-ikimenyetso; Aho nja hose, ndikw-ikimenyetso. Naradomwekw-ikimenyetso, Womeng-ico, bose barakizi. Narashizwekw-ikimenyetso Ngishizweko na Mpwemu W’Imana. Oh, Iman-Ishimwe, Haleluya! Amen! Nd-uwiWe na We n-Uwanje.
Bavuga ko mponobereye, Ko nononekaye; Ntibatahura na mba Ko nari mfis-imigambi, Ndaz-ivyo nasiz-aho Nsezeranirije kubandanya Kandi mfis-ubwiza bwinshi, Kuv-Iman-Impinduye.

Nitwajana n’Umukiza mu Bwiza, Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane? Ingorane n’imiruho bishize, Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane?
Chœur : Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane? Ata mitwaro namba, Turirimba inkengeri zivuga, Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane?
Tugendana tuvugana na Kristo, Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane? Dutazira duseng-Umw-Ahoraho, Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane?
Ah-igihuhusi kitazodutwara Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane? Umwam-Azotuzigam-ibihe vyose, Ntibizob-ari vyiza cane?

Intama zanJe Ziraz-Ijwi ryanJe, ZiraNkurikira aho nJa; Ziraz-Ijwi ryanJe, Mpamagaye zikaza, Ntiziz-ijwi ry’uwundi muntu.
Chœur : Ziraz-Ijwi ryanJe. Imisi yose, Ziguma mu mukuku, Ntizizimira. ZiraNkunda kuko Nazitoranije, ZiraNkurikira kuko Ziraz-Ijwi ryanJe.
Intama zanJe Ziraz-Ijwi ryanJe N’ubwatsi bwo Nziragiriramwo Ziraz-Ijwi ryanJe N’imigezi y’amazi Ndazishora ku maz-adasuma.
Ziraz-Ijwi ryanJe N’umwonga w’urupfu Uw-umus-umwe nzozicishamwo; Nta rinde, nta kibi Kizozikorako Kuko Nzokwama Ndi kumwe na zo.

Numvis-inkuru ya kera: Ukunt-Umukiza Yaje, Atang-Ubugingo i Kalvari Ngw-Akiz-umubi nkanje, Ukuntu Yaboroze, Atang-impongano y’Amaraso, Naciye nihan-aho Naharonkey-intsinzi.
Chœur : Intsinzi muri Yesu, Umukiza Wanje, Yarandondeye, Arancungura, Ancunguj-Amaraso, Ankunda nari ntaMuzi, NdaMukunda cane rwose, Anyibiza mu ntsinzi, Muri ya Soko yeza.
Barambwiye ko Akiza, K’ububasha bwiWe buhishura, Ukuntu Yagende-shej-ibimuga, ‘Gahumur-impumyi; Nca nsemerera nt’“Ee Yesu, Nkiz-umutim-ubabaye.” Acar-Az-ukuntu ntazi, Anzanir-intsinzi.
Barambariye ivy’Inzu Yanteguriye mu Bwiza, N’amabarabara y’inzahabu N’ikiyaga c’urubone, Ba marayika baririmba, N’Inkuru ya kera y’incungu; Umus-umwe mw’Ijuru Nzoririmba intsinzi.

Nari mu nyonga z’Imana mfis-agahinda, Mu manga natawemwo n’ivyaha, Ndi mu nyenga y’ivyondo ntabaz-Umwami, Mu rukund-Anshikana ku Musi mwiza.
Chœur : Yankuye mu vyondo vy’ibumba, Anshira ku Rutareee, Anshiramw-indirimb-uyu musi, Indirimbo y’ishimwe, Haleluya.
Yanyegerej-ah-Ari ku Gitandara, Ndashikamye kandi ni ho nzoguma, Sinzotemba namba ninagumaho, Gushika nambitsw-igitsibo, ku buntu.
Yampay-indirimbo nsha y’amashimwe, Iyo nzoririmb-ijoro n’umurango, Mu mutima n-impore ndanezerewe, Nshim-Umucunguzi Wanje Yantabaye.
Nzoririmb-ubuntu bwiWe kuri je, NdaMushime ngaragaz-Ubwiza bwiWe, Nzoririmb-agakiz-iwanje na hose Kugeza benshi bumvise, bakizera.
Ugomba gukesh- isaha nanje? Ubu ni yo ngiye, ubu ni yo ngiye! Ugomba gukesh- isaha nanje? Kuko ngiye gusenga.
Ô ndiko ndanesha! Ô ndiko ndanesha! Ô ndiko ndanesha! Ô ndiko ndanesha! Kuko nkunda Yesu, N-Umukiz-Ankunda kand-Antwengera.

Yesu, Wenyene, Atwar-Umusaraba, Aband-ataco batwaye? Oya, umwumwe ari n’uwiwe, Nanje ndafis-uwanje.
Nzikorera Umusaraba mweranda Gushits-aho nzopfira Hama mw’Ijuru, nzambar-igitsibo, Hariy-igitsibo canje.
Hariya, ku birenge vya Yesu Ku mbuga y’urubone, Nzoterer-igitsibo c’inzahabu Ndirimb-Izina ryiWe.
Musaraba mwiza, Gitsibo ciza, Musi we wo kuzuka: Bamarayika, muze mumanuke, Mujan-umushaha wanje.

Yari yicaye Ku nzir-asegerereza, Yar-impumyi, ntiyabon-umuco, Yifumbereje, ari mu mwijima. Hama Yes-Araza Yirukan-umwijima.
Chœur : Iyo Yes-Aje, igeragezwa riratsindwa; Iyo Yes-Aje, amosoz-arahava. ’kur-umubabaro, Akuzuz-ubuging-Ubwiza, Vyose bihinduka Yes-Aje kuhaba.
Yakuw-iwe mu biwe n’abadayimoni, Yagorewe amarushwa mu mva; Yikebagura, bamusesereje, Hama Yes-Araz-abohor-iyo mbohe.
Ubuhumane: umunyamibembe atabaza; Ibiragi, ibitumva vyari vyihebuye, Inyonk-ingwara vyari bigishibije, Hama Yes-Araz-Akurah-ubwoba bwose.
Uyu mus-abantu basanz-Umukiz-Ashoboye, Bari barananiwe kunesh-ivyipfuzo n’ivyaha, Imitima yabo imenets-ibabaye, Hama Yes-Araz-Avyagira muri bo.

Ndanezerewe, Yesu Yarambohoye, Ndanezerewe, Yesu Yarambohoye, Ndanezerewe Yarambohoye, Haleluya, Yesu Yarambohoye.
Ndanezerewe, Yesu Yarankijije, Ndanezerewe, Yesu Yarankijije, Ndanezerewe Yarankijije, Haleluya, Yesu Yarankijije.
Ngan-Ijuru nsemerer-intsinzi, Ngan-Ijuru nsemerer-intsinzi, Ngan-Ijuru nsemerer-intsinzi Haleluya, ndasemerer-intsinzi.
Oh, ni Yesu! Egome ni Yesu! Ni Yesu mu mushaha; Kuko nakoze k’ubuyonga bw’impuzu ziWe, Amaraso yiWe yarankijije.
Mbega si Mwiza, mbega si mwiza, Mbega si Mwiza? Mbega si Mwiza, Umwami Yesu? Amaso yabonye, amatw-arumva Ibiri mw-Ijambo ry’Imana; Mbega si Mwiz-Umwami Wanje Yesu?

Warabatijwe muri wa Mubiri? Ubatijwe na Mpwemu Yera;
N-uburyo bumwe bwo kuwinjiramwo Nk’uko babigize kuri Pentekote.
Chœur : Mbeg-uri muri rya Shengero ry’intsinzi, Mu Mugeni w’Umukiza? Nyaruk-ubatizwe muri wa Mubiri Kand-ugumey-ibihe vyose.
Har-Umugen-Umw-Ari Wo Mubiri, Uwo twese twabatijwemwo Na Mpwem-Umwe w’ukuri Yasezeranywe, Naho ku b’isi tugayitse twese.
Buri nemeye yiyis-uwo Mubiri, Ariko karish-irahakana Indoto zabo, kukw-Imana Yagabiye Kwerekan-Umugeni w’ukuri.
Benshi bifashe ko bari mu Mubiri Gushits-aho Mpwem-Aziriye, Ijambo ry’Imana Rihishuwe, Barinjiye; haracar-ibibanza.

Kera ngo inkumi zavom-amazi Mu gihe c’akagoroba, Isak-atum-Eliyezeli Guhagarika Rebeka “Ni databuj-andungitse: Rab-utubuyenge tw’igiciro. Ntugomba kub-umugeni wiwe Mw-ico gihugu iy-ari?”.
Chœur : Ku kagoroba hazobah-Umuco, Muzomeny-inzir-ija mu Bwiza. Guhambwa mu mazi, mw’Izina ryiza Rya Yesu Kristo ni wo Muco w’ubu. Abat-abakuze, ni mwihan-ivyaha, Mpwemu Yera Azobinjiramwo. N-Umuco w’akagoroba, Yukw-Imana na Krist-ar-Umwe.
Abakozi b’Imana na bo Bakubwir-Umukwe wo mw’Ijuru Arikw-Aronder-ihanga ryera Rizob-Umugeni wiWe; Yaduhay-Amazi y-Ubugingo Mur-iki gihe ciza cacu, Abazozamurwa bose Bazoca mur-ayo mazi.
Uri mu nzira y-uguhona, Udundumiwe n’amaganya? Rab-ic-Iman-Irikw- Irakora Ngo musangir-Ubwiza bwaYo. Ukwizera Yari Yahay-Abera Kwabay-ukwac-uyu musi; Kugir-ube mw’Ishengero ry’intsinzi, Uca mu nzira y-amazi.
Mbega woba waribajije Igitum-ata nkomez-uyu musi? Mbega wogum-uri mu vya kera, Mu nzira z’umuntu buntu? Bera mutarabatizwa Mw’Izina ry’Imana rihezagiwe, Rek-ukuri kubez-ubu; Iyo n-inzira y’intumwa.

Umukiz-Ahamagaye, nzokwitaba, Ampamagaye, nzokwumva. Umukiz-Ahamagaye, nzokwitaba, Nzoba nd-ahantu numviriz-izina ryanje.
Chœur : Nzoba nd-ahantu numviriza, Nzoband-ahantu numviriza, Nzoba nd-ahantu numviriz-izina ryanje; Nzoba nd-ahantu numviriza, Nzoba nd-ahantu numviriza, Nzoba nd-ahantu numviririz-izina ryanje.
Umutim-utunganye, Ampamagaye, Umutim-utunganye, nzokwumva; Umutim-utunganye, Ampamagaye, Nzoba nd-ahantu numviriz-izina ryanje.
Nimb-ikanzu yanje yera, Ampamagaye, Nimb-ikanzu yanje yera, nzokwumva; Nimb-ikanzu yanje yera, Ampamagaye, Nzoba nd-ahantu numviriz-izina ryanje.

Mu rugendo rwac-aha kw’isi, Duhura n’ingorane; Hamwe n’igitsibo c’amahwa, Ahand-umusaraba. Inzir-igoye y-i Kaluvari, Y’imibabar-ikabije, Arikw-ivy’imbere muri ya marembo Bizorengera vyose.
Chœur : Nitwashik-imbere muri ya marembo Tuzomenya vyinshi, Tuzogir-inanga y’inzahabu Nk’iy’imiry-igihumbi, Tuzoririmba dutambe, Umwagaz-Azoduhoza; Imyak-ibihumbi cumi ya mbere, Izob-indwi yo gutah-i muhira.
Umwiz-uratanguye kuhava, Igihe kiri hafi, Aho Krist-Umwami Wac-Azoza Nk-umuravyo mu kirere; Ubu turababazw-ariko Tuzoshim-Imana: Kurab-imbere muri ya marembo Bizorengera vyose.
Amaraso y’Umwana w’Imana Yarakijije, areza Ihanga ryiWe bwite ryiza cane Ryitw-Umugeni; Naho hano basuzugurwa, Umus-umw-Azobajana Imbere muri ya maremb-ivyo Bizorengera vyose.

cantique.titre: MUZE TUJANE MU NZU KWA DATA

livre.cantique:
Muze tujane mu Nzu kwa Data, Mu Nzu kwa Data, mu Nzu kwa Data. Muze tujane mu nzu kwa Data, Har-amahoro.
Yes-Azob-Ari mu Nzu kwa Data, Mu Nzu kwa Data, mu Nzu kwa Data. Yes-Azob-Ari mu Nzu kwa Data, Har-amahoro.
Mu Nzu kwa Data, nta mubabaro, Nta mubabaro, nta mubabaro. Mu Nzu kwa Data, nta mubabaro, Har-amahoro.

Twama twazungagijwe N’imikuba y’iki gihe, Hakabah-imiyag- Ikirere kigahinduka, Mu Gihugu gitekanye ahatar-ibicu, Tuzotahura neza bidatevye.
Chœur : Vuba cane, aho bukera, Ah-abera bose bazokorana, Tuzovug-uko twatsinz-intambara, Tuzotahura neza bidatevye.
Twama twabuz-ibisabwa N’ubuzima turimwo, Tugasonza, tukabur- Imirima n’aho tuba, Twiherez-Umwami Nkukw-Ijambo Ribivuga, Tuzotahura neza bidatevye.
Ntitwumv-ukuntu twama Turi mu mageragezwa, N’ukunt-Iman-Ituyobora Tugana mw’Ijuru, Itwamizakw-amaso, TuraYikurikira, Tuzotahura neza bidatevye.
Kenshi tugwa mu mitego Y’ibitugerageza, Imitima yac-igaseserezwa N’ibivugwa, Tugomvye gukor-iciza Tugir-ingorane, Tuzotahura neza bidatevye.

Umwam-Imana ni We nagiz-Ubuhungiro. Umwegera ntabw-azihebura na rimwe. Igihe cose naMutakambiye Yarumvise. Imbabazi ziWe zanjeko nari ndazikeneye.
Chœur : Yemw-abubah-Imana mwese nimuze mwumve, Yemw-abubah-Imana mwese nimuze mwumve, Nanje mvug-ivyo Yagiriy-ubugingo bwanje. Eka ntawogereranywa n’Uhoraho, Eka ntawogereranywa n’Uhoraho.
Narondey-Uhoraho naWe Aranyitaba. Ankiz-ubwoba bwinshi nari mfise bwose. Umutima wanje wose wizey-Uhoraho Ni We Mutabazi Wanje n’Inkomezi zanje zose.
Igihe cose maze nizigiy-Uhoraho, Yagiy-Ashigikir-intambuko zanje zose. Uhoraho Yamy-Ahuguruka, Akantabara; Yazigamy-amagufa yanje ngo ntavunagurike.
Umugororotsi yatakamvy-arira cane, Uhorah-Aramwumva mk’Imana y’imbabazi. Mu baMuhungiyeko nta n’umwe azomaramara. Hahirw-ihanga rifis-Uhoraho nk’Imana Yaryo.
Imana twizeye ni Yo Mana Yo gusengwa Kukw-Itwikorerer-imitwar-uko bukeye. Iyo tutabon-ugutabarwa n’Uhoraho. Is-iba yaratuyongobeje kandi tukibona.

Nagabiye kutaguma mboshwe N’ibintu vy’iyi si; Ivyo mw’Ijuru biruta vyose Vyarankwegereye.
Chœur : Nzokwihuta nj-iy-Ari, Ndanezerewe. Yesu MUrutavyose, Nje kuri WeWe.
Nagabiye kuja ku Mukiza, Nararets-ivyaha. Ni We Mwizigirw-Agororotse, Atang-Ubugingo.
Nagabiye kuMukurikira Simpemuke namba. Nzigam-Ijambo, nkor-ivy-Agomba, Nzira y’Ubugingo.
Nagabiye kwinjira mu Bwami, Narahevy-ivyaha. Bab-abankunda, bab-abanyanka, Ntawuzobimbuza.
Ukwo ni ko je nagabiye. Ni nd-agomba kunsanga? Twigishwe na Bibliya na Mpwemu, Twigire mw’Ijuru.

Nagabiye kutaronder- Ibidafis-ikimazi; Kwibera na Yesu bimp-umunezer- Uruta vyose.
Chœur : Nagabiye kwihereza Yesu Kristo; Mwami, nUnyobore Mu bugingo busha.
Nagabiye kudateba Guhungir-i Gologota. Ahamenekeye Amaraso Atang-Ubugingo.
Nawe fat-ingingo kimwe nanj- Igihe kirarenze. Heb-ivy’isi, wihereze Yesu, Herak-ubu nyene.

Umucanwa w’Imana watse mu mutima, Umucanwa w’Imana watse mu mutima, Umucanwa w’Imana watse mu mutima, Umucanwa watse mu mutima.
Nkundana Yes-umutima, Nkundana Yes-umutima, Nkundana Yes-umutima, Nkundana Yes-umutima.
NdaMushiman-igishika, NdaMushiman-igishika, NdaMushiman-igishika, NdaMushiman-igishika.
Haleluya! NAhimbazwe! Haleluya! NAhimbazwe! Haleluya! NAhimbazwe! Haleluya! NAhimbazwe!
Yes-Araje kutujana. Yes-Araje kutujana. Yes-Araje kutujana. Yes-Araje kutujana.
NuMwakiran-umutima, NuMwakiran-umutima, NuMwakiran-umutima, NuMwakiran-umutima,
Mwakirany-umunezero. Mwakirany-umunezero. Mwakirany-umunezero. Mwakirany-umunezero.
Imana ntIpfa, n’ubu ni Nzima. Imana ntIpfa, n’ubu ni Nzima. Imana ntIpfa, n’ubu ni Nzima. NdaYumva mu maboko, NdaYumva mu maguru, NdaYumva mu mutima, NdaYumva mu mushaha, Numv-Inzungurutse hose.

Izuba rirarenze, gitondo ciza, Hamwe n’Umukiza, haz-Ijuru. Nta mubabaro, mutwenzi mwiza; Izuba rirarenz-umus-uragiye.
Izuba rirarenze, nta gicu namba, Nta n’isegenya, nta n’ubwoba. Musi w’ivyiza, mus-uhoraho; Izuba rirarenze, n-amahoro.
Izuba rirarenze, mfis-Unyobora Ku Mana Data, Iyo nsenga; Iri kumwe nanje, nzohabw-ikaze, Nzakirwa nez-iyo mw’Ijuru.
Izuba rirarenze, tuzobonana N’abakunzi bacu badusize. Ntituzokwigera dutandukana, Mw’ico Gihug-izuba rirenze.

Dushim-Uganza mw’Ijuru Hejuru ya vyose, Yatanz-Umwana kugira Ngw-Acungur-abantu.
Chœur : Dushim-Izina, dushim-Izina, Dushim-Izina Ry’Umwami; Dushim-Izina, dushim-Izina, Dushim-Izina Ry’Umwami. (Yesu n-Izina . . .) (Himbaz-Izina . . .).
Izina Rye Rihimbazwe Kurenger-ayandi, I buryo bwa Data Ahar-abamarayika.
Umucunguz-Umukunzi W’abari bagowe; Waragabiye kubakiza, Wemera gupfa.
Azokwitw-Umujenam- Umwami w’amahoro, Yatsinz-inganji zose zo kw’isi, Ntazohangura.

Oh! Rab-ukuntu W-Ameze, Acecekesh-ikiyaga, Agakiz-abarway-ibimuga, Agakiz-impumyi, Yugurur-amabohero, Akabohor-imbohe, Ng’ukwo kuntu We Ameze, Mbega n-Umuntu ki!
Chœur : N-Umwami w’Ubwiza, Ni NDIH-AHAMBAYE; Ni We Alufa na Omega, Tanguriro n’Iherezo; Yitw-Umurwaneza, Umwami w’amahoro; Ni Data Ahoraho Ibihe bihoraho.
Oh! Rab-ukuntu W-Ameze, Wa mugore kw’iriba, Yamubwiye Ati, “Ndaguhaye Ubugingo busagutse, Uwuzonyw-Amazi muhaye, Azokwam-ahoraho.” Ng’ukwo kuntu We Ameze, Mbega n-Umuntu ki!
Oh! Rab-ukuntu W-Ameze, Akiz-ibimuga, At-“Ikorer-uburiri bwawe, Urahariw-ivyaha” Yasemerey-Azi kw-Akiza, Ati, “Nimunyizere.” Ng’ukwo kuntu We Ameze, Mbega n-Umuntu ki!
Oh! Rab-ukuntu W-Ameze, Yuzuz-abantu n’Imana! Amaso yiWe ni nk’urubey- Afis-Inyenyeri ndwi; Yohana we yaMubony-Ari Muri ya Mashengero ndwi. Ng’ukwo kuntu We Ameze, Mbega n-Umuntu ki!
Oh! Rab-ukuntu W-Ameze, Ari ku Ntebe yiWe. Ari mw’Ijur-Akaganz-abiWe, Akanabayobora, Ntambwe yo mu muryango wa Yuda, Umunago wa Dawidi. Ng’ukwo kuntu We Ameze, Mbega n-Umuntu ki!
Nzirikan-Urukundo rwa Yesu, Hamwe n’ivyo Yankoreye vyose. Haleluya! Warakoze Mwami, Kwitanga i Gologota.

Imana Yatoranije kuva kera Guha abaY-Ubugingo budashira, Yabatoranirije kugir-Ishusho Ya Yesu Krist-Umwana waYo.
Chœur : Wumvir-Ijwi rihamagar-uyu musi, Wa mumarayika w’indwi yarashitse; Ijwi rihamagar-abatoranijwe Kwakir-Ubutumwa bw’igihe. None ncuti yanj-itab-ubutumire, Ubatizwe mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo. Iki ni co gihe co kugarukanwa Muri kwa kwizera kw’intumwa.
Buri gihe cahaw-Ubutumwa bwaco, Ab’igihe co kwa Nowa barumvise, Ab’igihe ca Mose bahaw-Ijambo, Natwe dufis-isezerano.
Yesu ni We Mwam-Aganz-abami bose Muri We harimw-agakiza gashitse; Yavuze yuko mu gihe c’iherezo Yoturungikiye Eliya.
Ivyariwe na za nzige zikegeta, N’ivyariwe na za nzige zararaye, N’izitaragurika, n’iziyigiza Vyaramaze kugarukanwa.
Ivyavuzwe na ya mituragaro ndwi, Yohana yarabujijwe kuvyandika; Vyahishuriw-umumarayika w’indwi, Bizan-ukiwizera kw’intumwa.

Igihe kirageze co guhemburwa Nk’uko vyari vyaravuzwe, Co kugarukanwa mu kwizera nyako Kwo mw’Ishengero rya mbere. Twagarukanywe mu kwizera kw’intumwa, Mu mu batizo w’intumwa; Twabatijwe mw’Izina rya Yesu Kristo, Twejejwe n’Ijambo ryiWe.
Chœur : Nuze ncuti yanje, Ha Yes-umutima; Uwo ni We Mana y’ukuri Yehova; Ehe Yashikije isezerano Ryo kurungika Eliya.
Imana Yabwiye Eliya kutuzi- ganiriz-ibifungurwa, Ni vyo bitegur-Umugeni wa Yesu Kw’isi mu mahanga yose. Eh-abamaze kwezwa babatizwa na Mpwemu Yera, n’Umucanwa; Arikw-Arashikan-Ishengero ryiWe Kw’Ibuye ry’Agasongero.
Nubaz-ukuntu uwo Eliya yimu- kiye muri Arizona, Yahahuriye n’abamarayika ndwi Bamuzaniy-Ubutumwa; Ubwo Butumwa bwamuhay-itegeko Gusubir-i buseruko, Gushir-ahabon-ivyo Yohana yari Yarabujijwe kwandika.
Ayo ni yo mabanga yari yanyege- jwe mu Bimatanijwe Ndwi. Ni y-agarukan-Umugeni vy’ukuri Mu kwizera kwa ba data. Ukwo ni ko kwitegurira vy’ukuri Ukugaruka kwa Yesu, Ah-Azob-Aje kuzamur-Ishengero Ryambitsw-Ijambo ry’ukuri.
Muri Zekariya cumi na kane ku Murongo ugira indwi, Haravugw-igihe c’akagoroba ko Tworungikiwe Umuco. Soma muri Malaki kane wonger-u- some Luka cumi n’indwi, Som-Ivyahishuw-igihimba c’icumi; Vyos-aho ni ho vyanditswe.

Imana Yaduhay-Ubugingo Muri Yesu, Umukiza; Igomba yukw-abaYo bakizwa; Yatanz-Umwan-Aradupfira.
Chœur : Yesu nUgumane natwe, Tuyobor-ijoro n’umurango; Waratwitangiy-i Kaluvari, Ni WeWe Wadukijije.
Nta wundi tworonkamw-agakiza Atari muri Yesu Kristo; Nta rindi Zina twahawe kw’isi, Tworonkeramw-ugucungurwa.
Ntawashoboye kweger-Imana, Ngo yabire ca Gitabu, Amatur-Ibimatanijwe ndwi, Kirets-Umwagazi w’Imana.
Wamatuy-ibimatanijwe ndwi, Wihishuriy-intumwa y’indwi; Twaragarukaniw-Igitabu, NUshimwe Waraducunguye!

Zan-Umuco muri Afrika, Ahar-abari mu mwijima; Bwir-abantu bose bariho Yuko Yes-Akiza, Ko Yadukijije.
Chœur : Ni We Mwami, Ni We Mwami; Ni We Mwami, Ni We Mwami; Ni We Mwami Aganz-abaganza bose, Yesu ni We Mwami.
Umuco waje muri Afrika, Ubutumwa bw’intumwa y’indwi; Wamubwiy-aze muri Afrika, Ahishura Yesu, Umukiza Wacu.
Twarakiriy-Ubwo Butumwa Bwagarukanye kwa kwizera Kwari mw’Ishengero rya mbere Ry’Umwami w’abami, Umukiza wacu.
Mana hezagir-Uburundi, Bwakir-Ubutumwa bw’igihe; Abarundi bamenye neza Ko Yes-Ar-IMANA, Umukiza wacu.
Ubutumwa bwaje mu Burundi, Abarundi barabatizwa Mw’Izina ry’Umwami Yesu Kristo, We Mana y’ukuri, Umukiza wacu.

Kristo ah-Azogarukira, Aje Ari ku bicu, Mb-is-izishima kuMubona , Umwami nAgaruka?
Chœur : Indirimb-amaborogo, Intunt-umubabaro, Bazorira, bazosenga, Umwami nAgaruka.
Mbeg-uzob-umunezero, Cank-azob-amarira, Uzob-uMwiteguriye, Umwami nAgaruka?
Uzob-uri mu barira, Canke mu baririmba? UzoMwambik-igitsibo, Umwami nAgaruka?
Kor-usenga kugez-aho Yes-Azokurengutsa, Nusarur-uzonezerwe Umwami nAgaruka.
